Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Archdemons,
and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies.

name: Dummy Defense
summary:
The spin-off of SimplePhysics. Protect your dummy from explosions, boulders, spiked walls, and more!
Use the blueprints editor to design a structure that will protect your dummy, Melvin, from some random danger. You'll have to work with the available materials. Most of the time you'll use wood, sometimes you'll use concrete, but you must always use your most important asset: your brain.
A wise person once said: "An engineer is someone who can do for a dime what any fool can do for a dollar." In Dummy Defense, your design must not only be strong enough, it must be cheap enough to win. Building cheaper structures will earn you more stars on a level.
Create your design in seconds with the blueprints editor. If you make a mistake, simply tap the Undo button. Zoom in and out by pinching the screen and pan the view using a two finger drag.
While testing, you can see how the strain is distributed across your design. Areas that are under immense strain are colored bright red, while other areas are colored green. This allows you to find and fix problem areas in your design.
The slow motion slider lets you slow things down so you can see how your design is failing, and it is also incredibly fun to watch explosions destroying your design in slow motion.

name: Dungeon Dogs
summary: From the makers of award-winning Castle Cats, Dungeon Dogs is an idle RPG that allows you to battle, build, collect and craft all from the comfort of your mobile device. Join our rebels Lyra, Ken and Poppy on their adventures in Lupinia to take down the evil cat king, who is suppressing the canine population and treating them as second-class citizens.

name: Dungeons and Tiles
summary: An Action Role-Playing dungeon crawler, with randomly generated dungeons and challenging bosses to defeat for loot and glory.

name: Dungeons Diced
summary: Be Tactical! buy gear and crawl the dungeons. Death is permanent. Classes are very different! a new combat system, different than anything you've seen before!

name: Dungeon Dungeon!
summary: Dungeon Dungeon! is a turn-based RPG with roguelike elements and a loot system. Recruit companions, upgrade skills, collect loot and build up your team to conquer the dungeons!

name: Dungeon Renovators
summary: Dungeon Renovators is a base-builder and action RPG with online co-op. You are a Renovator: combat-ready craftsmen who reclaim dungeons for humanity, demolish evil structures for materials, then build bases to train, craft equipment, attract workers, level up and rebuild civilization!

name: Dusk Pub
summary: As the manager of Dusk Pub, you have to put in a lot of efforts to run your own worn-down bar and expand your business to other parts of the land Brent. Meet a variety of cute girls and recruit them as servers, helping them develop their business talent and know them inside out.

name: Duck Think Outside the Flock
summary: 25 levels for you to crack while you quack!

name: Dungeon Diver
summary: Only cartridge on the Bandai Design Master that isn’t licensed from an existing property. In Dungeon Diver you explore randomly generated dungeons fighting monsters in RPG battles and solving simple puzzles. As with the other games, additional design/manga carts can be mounted and used for additional stamps.

name: Dungeon Quest
summary:
An offline loot filled ARPG for all!

Embark on a journey to find the best loot and defeat all challengers in this truly free-to-play Offline Action RPG.

Featuring randomized loot, dynamically generated dungeons, and 4 acts each with their own legendary boss awaiting. Journey through unlimited floors of increasingly difficult enemies while collecting the best items possible and competing with your friends in our Battle Arena competitive leagues.

Equip your Wizard, Warrior, or Rogue with infinitely customizable weapons and armor to help destroy the elemental evils plaguing the land. There are always new ways to vanquish your foes! Upgrade your gear with our Crystal and Mythstone crafting system. Make your character even more powerful using our Gear-Based Skill and Talent system.

Tired of playing alone? Bring your other characters into combat with you to gain experience and loot alongside your hero using our Hireling system. Or maybe you'll come across one of the many endearing companions included in our Pet system!

name: Dungeon Squad
summary: A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss.

name: Dungeons and Myths
summary: "Dungeons and Myths" is a 2D tower defence game with a roguelike element. Place traps and monsters to defend your dungeon, pick upgrade after every wave of enemies!

name: Dungeon Manager ZV 2: Expansion Pack
summary: ・Additional dungeons planned ・More than 10 additional items to use in your dungeon design ・Transformation of your monsters into third forms

name: Dungeons 3: DLC Bundle
summary: Contains expansion packs “Once Upon a Time”, “Evil of the Caribbean”, “Lord of the Kings”, “Clash of Gods”, “An Unexpected DLC”, “Famous Last Words” and a new skirmish map pack as well as several free content updates.

name: Dungeon
summary: Dungeon is a VMU game released with Time Stalkers.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Duels Kings
summary: Take part in epic battles, test amazing heroes, choose the strongest one. Enter the competitive mode, where the battle for the individual rating awaits you. Raise your place on the leaderboard and get ready to fight for the title of the best player of the season! Or join forces with friends, develop tactics and win together.

name: Dukedom
summary: Dukedom is a turn-based strategy text-based video game about land management and was created as an expanded version of Hamurabi.

name: Duotrigordle
summary: A daily guessing game in which players must identify 32 hidden target words within 37 guesses. Each guess will reveal information about the correct letters contained within each word, and their positions within the word.

name: Duel Revolution
summary: A new monster taming MMORPG with a strategic real-time Duel system, Open World Exploration, Messaging System, Day and Night Cycles and continuous Storyline. Take on this ever changing adventure and more in the world of Bitacora.

name: Dune MUD
summary:
Dune Mud is a classic multiplayer online text adventure game (MUD) based in Frank Herbert's DUNE Universe. Since 1992 Dune has been the LP MUD of choice for several generations of amazing players. Create a character, join one of ten guilds, and explore the 30,000+ game rooms. Enjoy opt-in PK and numerous in-game quests.

Friendly players! Social atmosphere! Passionate playerbase! Discord integration! Active coding staff!

name: Duck Turnip
summary: a thing use arrows

name: Dungeon Crawl
summary: Dungeon Crawl is a simplified maze RPG game similar to rogue-like RPGs, except that in Dungeon Crawl the dungeon is always the same and not randomly generated. To make progress through the dungeon and reach the next dungeon levels, the player has to find keys to unlock doors and find buttons which opens up formerly inaccessible sections. Typical fantasy monsters roam the dungeon, often blocking your path. Killing them gives XP, which is needed to further improve your characters attack and defense values.

name: Dungeons of Kairn
summary:
Save the kingdom of Hamnlin from the Mad Mage Inshanis, by setting out to recover Artifacts hidden throughout the vast lands of Kairn. Recruit new adventurers from a variety of professions and level them up as you gain experience, slay monsters and explore the dungeons.

The Mad Mage is in possession of all the Artifacts save three. These you must recover, then journey to the Mad Mage’s island and use them to defeat him. The shareware version only includes the first dungeon; a registered copy adds the other 3.

name: Dungeons of Moscow
summary:
Dungeons of Moscow is a throwback classic first person shooter game.

Your main quest is to kill the necromancer Ivan the Terrible who revives evil spirits.
Beware of traps and harmful items what can kill you more quickly than enemies. Explore the different locations of dungeons and find all weapons to use them in final boss fight. This is your way to become a hero who defeated evil and save the civilians.

name: Dumpy: Going Elephants!
summary: Strap on that Oculus Rift to become Dumpy the Elephant! She just broke out of a carnival and is bopping her way to freedom. Rotate your head to fling cop cars over mountains and smash delicious ice cream trucks with your mighty trunk.

name: Duck Nukem: Four Feathers
summary: After starring in the successful Fly Hard action movie trilogy, you retired to a small cabin in the woods. You grew comfortable in the quiet life you had created. Soon, you also grew too fat to fly anywhere. Then, one day without warning, the outside world came crashing back into your life. It was not a good time to be a duck. Play as Howard the Duck across 20 levels of intense action. Your mission? Take him to Heaven!

name: Dumb Ways to Draw 2
summary: Grab your trusty magical pen - it’s up to you to save your favorite Dumb Ways to Die Characters including Numpty, Numpty, Botch, Stumble, Putz, Numskull, Lax, Mishap, and more!

name: Dumb Ways to Draw
summary: Dumb Ways to Draw is a drawing puzzle game from the world of Dumb Ways To Die! Full of your favourite Beans but not in the way you remember!

name: DUCK: Dangerous Ultimate Cartridge Kidnapper
summary: A group of ducklings finds a mysterious 100-in-1 cartridge and are now forced to play all the games to escape the insidious cartridge spirit!

name: Duelyst GG
summary: Duelyst is a unique hybrid 1v1 card game where you play your units and spells onto a 9x5 board where you can position them to your advantage. You can pick from different generals with unique Bloodbound spells. All 800+ cards are unlocked so you can play anything you want from the start.

name: Ducky Dive
summary:
New updated version with wide screen interface, faster game pace with more challenging game play and clearer water color.
A simple game, combining realistic buoyancy simulation with intriguing graphic art. The simple game play will provide small excitement that perfectly suitable for in-between activities time waster.
Help the duck to dive and catch the fish, while keep watching the air and power level. Running out of the air will accelerate the power level decrement. When the power level is zero, the game is over. Several floating woods and barrel, all with realistic floating movement, will become the obstacles for the duck to maneuver. The other challenge is the piranhas. Designed with simple AI (Artificial Intelligence), the Piranhas will swim after the duck whenever they meet the duck. The new updated version also include the underwater tunnels as one of the obstacles.
Virtuaego is an indie developer in Jakarta, Indonesia. Ducky Dive is Virtuaego’s first game/ applications for iOS.

name: Duckers
summary:
Join Duckers and friends on a wild treasure hunt in this fantastic mining adventure.
Dig for gold coins and gems, and collect all the secret items to complete your collection.
With its adorable cast of characters, different areas to unlock, and numerous upgrades, Duckers is endless fun for the whole family.
Earn Game Center achievements as you complete your collection of secret goodies, or compete for the best score with your friends on the leaderboard.
How deep can you go? What dangers and treasures are waiting for Duckers and his friends? Don't wait any longer, download Duckers now and get digging.

name: Dungeon Survive
summary: Dungeon Survive is a roguelike survival game, You can choose different weapons and specialized skills, Make each weapon have a different play experience. Try to survive in the monster pack with specialized weapons! Also, how many seconds can you live in the endgame?

name: Dunker.io
summary: Start dunking in an insane multiplayer .io basketball court, yup!

name: DuoXBall
summary: DuoXBall is a fun foosball game for 1 or 2 players. There is a selection of 11 tables with range of themes. Play on the same phone against your friend or challenge the computer.

name: Dungeon of the Endless: Definitive Edition
summary:
Dungeon of the Endless - Definitive Edition

Dungeon of the Endless is Amplitude Studios’ take on the demanding Roguelike genre, mixing in Dungeon-Defense mechanics for a unique gameplay experience.
Condemned to slave labor in the Auriga system as punishment for a life of crime, your situation goes from bad to worse when you crash land in a mazelike Endless facility on an unknown planet.
Your only goal is to survive and get out of there. For that you’ll need a team: inmates, guards, and any survivors have the potential to become great allies.
Explore the facility and unearth life-saving technologies. Your teammates will also need some gear to unleash their true potential and earn powerful abilities. And don’t forget to gather Dust! Without it, you’ll be stuck in the dark.
With monsters at your heels and a merry band of misfits for a team, get ready for a bumpy ride with the Definitive Edition which, along with the base game, includes:

Dungeon of the Endless - Deep Freeze

The “Refreezerator” spaceship will let you experience the game in a different way as well as introduce a new teammate: Kreyang. Don’t touch anything related to Drakken history in her presence… you might lose a hand.

Dungeon of the Endless - Rescue Team

You’ve crashed somewhere in an uncharted part of the galaxy? No one is responding to your cries for help? Fear not, the Rescue Team is on its way! For drill sergeant Sasha, operator Zugma and… Audio engineer Wes, failure is not an option.

name: Dungeon Gunner
summary: Slay the diverse enemies you encounter while exploring the deep dungeons. A variety of equipment awaits that will make you more powerful. Grow stronger as you delve deeper into the dungeons and survive until you reach the very depths! How long can you last?

name: Dungeons and Myths 2
summary: "Dungeons and Myths 2" is a 2D tower defence game with a roguelike element. Place traps and monsters to defend your dungeon, pick upgrade after every wave of enemies! New enemies and new defence tactics!

name: Dungeon Time
summary:
A sorcerer known as the Prophet has spilled Chaos into the world. Four weathered adventurers must track him down and find out if it was just a misunderstanding or if the world is really going to end.
Dungeon Time features arcade quality gaming with a sprinkle of smooth mobile controls. Crawl with up to 4 players Co-Op or go just go it alone. Homage to RPG & shmup classics - a top-down shooter with zombies, wizards, demons, and exploding owls.

name: DuoDuo
summary: Just tilt your device to control the DuoDuo. Fall down through the holes and avoid getting squished at the top. Get scores by staying alive as long as possible.

name: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Beards
summary:
Battle of the Beards tests your reflexes and drops you “boots-first” into the Louisiana backwoods to compete in the Robertson family’s favorite redneck activities. Master rapid-fire challenges, unlocking gear and earning experience along the way, to prove you’ve got what it takes to grow a beard as long as your favorite Duckmen.   As you play, your character will go from a Bluetooth-earpiece-wearing, clean-shaven businessman, to a fully camouflaged, long-haired, bandana-clad backwoodsman with a beard that would even make Phil jealous.  
Can you keep up as the pace increases? Or will you be left in the dust as the heat turns up?

name: Duplicado
summary: Duplicado is a unique, procedurally-generated puzzle game that is both meditative and challenging. Journey across a peaceful avocado orchard, planting trees as you slide and solve your way through a nearly endless number of stimulating puzzles.

name: Dutch's Chickens
summary: Explore, discover secrets, gain awesome abilities and use them to find all your lost chickens!

name: Dungeon Shooter: Dark Temple
summary: A retro style FPS & RPG game.

name: Dudeology 1
summary: Dudeology 1 - The game that tests how much of a "dude" you are. There are 20 questions in 4 categories. If you get more than 3 correct in each category, you will be rewarded!

name: Dummy Never Fails
summary: Shoot dummies out of a cannon to reach the goal. The less pain, the better!

name: Dummy Never Fails 2
summary: Dummy Never Fails 2 is a great physics-based puzzle game in which you throw crash dummies from a cannon and hit the target to complete a level. The never failing dummy returns after the great success of the original game. The less pain the dummy receives, the better.

name: Dummy Pirates
summary: Dummy Pirates is a 3D Action MOBA game with a third-person perspective set in Planet Chromotica. The entire game operates on a multiplayer system. Using WASD, the player is able to move around and explore different areas of the map (Ocean Tales) and engage in combat. The character faces challenges fighting over the rewards and eliminating the enemy team. Many beneficial collectibles and magical items can be acquired and used to help win the game.

name: Dungeon Renovation Simulator
summary: Dungeon Renovation Simulator offers a unique adventure where you step into the shoes of a “Cursed Goblin” cleaner and renovator in a medieval-inspired world. In this single-player simulation game, you’ll explore, clean and revive intriguing environments, each with its own set of physics-based challenges and hidden quests.

name: Dukes Up
summary: Dukes Up is a 2D action platformer which harkens back to the 8-bit games of yesterday.

name: Dungeon of Theseus
summary: Dungeon of Theseus is a Rogue-lite deckbuilding auto-battler. Enjoy the fun of deckbuilding without the hassle of playing cards. At the beginning of each round, three characters will be drawn from the deck, and the combat will proceed automatically.

name: Dungeon Dot Ruby
summary: Delve into the Master Dungeon as you explore the unyielding tunnels from a top-down view or hop and bop through expansive caverns in 2d-sidescrolling action! Danger and discovery are to be found wherever you are in this retro-style adventure!

name: Dust Kingdom
summary: Un brouillard mortel recouvre le royaume, affrontez des hordes de monstres lors de périlleuses expéditions à la recherche de la source du mal.

name: Dummy Pirates: Ocean Tales
summary: From the Planet Chromatica, the first 3D TPS sailing MOBA game! Become the King-of-Dummies by competing and winning in deadly matches, while exploring the wonders of the Ocean Tales.

name: Dungeon Cleaner
summary: Dungeon Cleaner is a rogue.lite focused on a fast game Flow, a dynamic combat system and the strategic use of the environment.

name: Durka Simulator
summary: Durka Simulator is a visual novel where you are waiting for adventure and mystery.You as the main player are being sought to take away your power.You and mysterious must not let them catch you!With you will always be your friends as a lemur named Zina, Mysterious and Larry

name: Dungeon King
summary: Dungeon King is a turn-based adventure puzzle. Player should smash all enemies on tile based map avoiding traps and plan his moves ahead.

name: Dungeons and Raids
summary: Dungeons and Raids is a gacha game where you will collect heroes and make them fight in the dungeons...

name: Dungeon Furry
summary: Explore Dungeons, with enemies and puzzles, and horny girls. After the best rewards you can get for saving furry girls.

name: DunHero
summary: Dunhero is Roguelike game where character is in procedurally generated dungeon. Hero has to explore a lot of different rooms, level up character and gather equipment to defeat all enemies and reach final stage.

name: Dungeon in Grid Puzzles
summary: This is a puzzle game using numbers. There are many monsters on a floor. The distance that the Lady Hilde can move is fixed, and she can only move to the position of an enemy that is weaker than her. And she becomes stronger every time she defeats a monster. Conquer up to 30 underground floors!

name: Dungeon of Zaar: Explorer Edition
summary: Unlock plenty of amazing content for Dungeon of Zaar!

name: Dual Chroma: Academy Carols
summary: Spend winter break with the popular and unapproachable Prince of the Empire in this cozy and heartwarming magic academy dating sim.

name: DunkDog Dreams
summary: Fast paced run style game where you avoid defenders and obstacles as you make your way down the court. Learn to spin dribble around your opponents or split the defenders to avoid fouling. You can Shoot or Dunk at the side hoops for extra points and throw down your best dunk at the final hoop to complete the level.

name: Dungeons and Doggos
summary: Endless dog based platformer set in a fantasy world for #playdate

name: Dungeon Dash: Tales of the Necromancer
summary: Dungeon Dash is a fast paced puzzle arcade where you "Dash" your way through dungeons and maps. Customize your character, unlock new armor and build your town or compete against a friend in a procedurally generated dungeon.

name: Dungeons & Jewels
summary:
Dungeons & Jewels is a Tile-Matching Roguelike.
Collect Relics. Learn Spells. Fight monsters and use your abilities by matching tiles, creating combos, and solving puzzles!

name: Dude Quest
summary: Dude Quest is a satirical monster catcher RPG heavily inspired by Pokémon, released back in 2014 as a flash game. Features 59 Dudes to collect and use on your journey.

name: Due Date
summary: Your Art assignment is due in 20 seconds... Will you see what's beyond?

name: Dude Simulator 5
summary: Dude Simulator 5 is an open world sandbox game. Your goal is to become president! However, it will not be so easy to do this, which means that many adventures await you on your way.

name: Dunjunguy
summary: Dunjunguy is a randomly generated action RPG dungeon-crawler with Rogue-like elements. Following brave adventurers on their journey into the DUNJUN players will find bizarre unique items, epic loot, and pets that buff the player's abilities and enable them to fight off the endless hordes of creatures.

name: Dungeon Slave
summary: This is a Dungeon themed Hack and Slash, adventure through the dungeon and defeat all enemies and bosses, level up characters and create a variety of combos

name: Dungeon Hunter Survival
summary: Dungeon hunter survival a game that offers you hours of fun. DHS combines strategy, RPG and Rouge like game stages to extend the your enjoyment.

name: Dual Spin
summary: Do you have the skills to master a simple gem puzzles game that can be really demanding? In our Dual Spin Game we require to arrange the gems in correct order. It looks easy, but it is definitely hard to master. If you love thinking challenges, try Dual Spin, you will not be disappointed.

name: Ducky's Delivery Service
summary: Propeller-powered duck delivery action! In Ducky's Delivery Service, you are a duck who uses a propeller backpack to fly around and deliver mail. Master the flight physics, grow your delivery business, fulfill special delivery requests from other ducks, and earn time attack ranks and high scores.

name: Dungeon Creator
summary: This is an online 2D platform game about dungeon, where you can build scenes and take adventures. You can not only design your own dungeon, but also challenge dungeons of other game players.We provide a wealth of dungeon game material. It's totally up to you to decide the layout of the entire dungeon, as well as the placement of each trap and enemy!Also you can take adventures in almost unlimited number of dungeons created by other players, plunder their treasure, and show them your super game skills!

name: Dune of the Desert
summary: A vehicular-combat focused game set in a post apocalyptic desert, the player takes the role of a bounty hunter tasked with taking down some of the most feared creatures in the desert. Collect artefacts, crystals, and other highly sort after items to upgrade your vehicle for high intensity combat.

name: Duality: An Era of Stone
summary:
Undertake your deity right, and create unlimited resources for your population by matching. Shape the world in which they live with unique customization, unlock technology, and avoid calamities. Gather Devotion and use your deity powers to blast through the Stone Age. Each level prompts you to make decisions, which influence how the population perceives you.

Solve match 3 puzzle games and steer your population through the Stone Age!

Are you ready to help your population survive and thrive through the Stone Age?

name: Dungeon Legend
summary: This is a casual breakout game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .

name: Dungeons & Dragons Bundle
summary: Dive into award-winning Dungeons & Dragons RPG classics, enhanced for modern adventurers! Immerse yourself in epic RPGs where every choice matters. Your adventure awaits with these five enhanced editions…

name: Dungeon
summary: Dungeon is a tragic platformer about what can happen in a castle, and how it affects people like you and me.

name: Dungeons of Fayte
summary: Dungeons of Fayte is a dungeon crawler for one to four players with enough content to keep either a single player or a group of friends going for a good while. The Bone Lord, ruler of the Underworld, is planning an attack and the heroes need to train in various dungeons before taking the Bone Lord and his cronies on.

name: Dunk Tower
summary:
Do you like basketball games? Do you like casual games?
Then find the two together in Dunk Tower! An incredible, challenging and addictive game!
Score baskets and overcome the challenges before the water covers your tower!
And more, have you thought about play basketball with a soda or a barrel? Collect all crazy skins for your basketballs!

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance - Day One Edition
Dungeon's Legion
summary: It's time to rise up! When you're reincarnated into a fantasy world as the demon king, it's your duty to lead the demons and conquer the human world! Defend your dungeons from any adventurers who dare enter and attain victory by slaughtering your enemies!

name: Dungeon of Insanity
summary: Dungeon of Insanity is an action-adventure roguelike that puts the hero inside a dungeon full of enemies, traps, gold, and crazy characters. Face the undead, find treasures, save the princess, beat up the necromancer.

name: Dunar: Dimension Two
summary: A traditional jrpg game, turn-based with unique moments and a fascinating story focused on the purple light’s past.

name: Dungeon Golf
summary: Pick your golfer from a roster of whacky fantasy favourites in this mini golf party game! Compete in online and local multiplayer or polish your putt in single player story mode. Whack balls, defeat monsters, and get the upper hand with unique abilities to stay one swing ahead of your opponents.

name: Dungeon Mage
summary: Dungeon-Crawler with crafting, combat and exploration. Defeat enemies, collect resources, craft or find equipment and explore the dungeon in order to get stronger. Do to not give in when the celestials come for you ...

name: Dungeon of Argion
summary: Fight the underground creatures of Argion to free the land from a curse. You have to fight your way through several dungeons full of dangerous creatures and bosses. Try to utilise, level up and combine many different weapons and passive items to stand a chance of defeating them all.

name: Duet Cats
summary: The music world of cute popcat are out now - c a t s sounds. Let's control the hottest popcat duet ever. Who will be the diva cat in this cats tower?

name: Durandal
summary: A companion visual novel for Honkai Impact 3rd. Stars a younger Durandal and Rita Rossweisse on their mission in the Sea of Quanta to investigate a bubble universe.

name: Dual Tennis
summary:
Super Adrenaline rush when you reach 80-100 score range. Experience it!!.
Table Tennis games can be fun because you need rapid reflex to hit the ball back. But what happens when two tables are used to play table tennis? A lot!! Get an adrenaline rush trying to defeat the two opponents in this dual table tennis game. It’s a perfect mix of casual and arcade games with cool graphics and features.

name: DungeonSmash
summary: A simple and addictive game where you break blocks in medieval dungeons.

name: Dungeon, Inc.
summary:
As Dungeon, Inc.’s new Gold Production Manager, you must maximize profits by any means necessary. Nothing is too devious to consider - if it works! Build your dungeon deeper, expand into new environments, and recruit mischievous monsters; the more you tap, the bigger the dungeon, and the more gold you make!
Collect monsters to help defend your dungeon from pesky Tax Knights and rival managers - then send your monsters off to sabotage others! When the insurance value of your dungeon is high enough, trigger an ‘accident’ to cash in on your value and start again. What are YOU willing to do to become Manager of the Week?

name: Duck
summary: Duck (Chinese: 醜小鴨, a literal translation meaning Ugly Duck, also known as Duck Maze) is an unlicensed clone of Doki Doki Penguin Land, made for the Famicom in 1987 by Bit Corp. and released in Taiwan, Australia and Brazil by Bit Corp., HES and Dismac respectively.

name: Ducklyte
summary: Ducklyte is a top-down shooter with roguelite elements where you play as a constipated little duck trying to stay alive as long as possible in a randomly generated farm with progressively stronger enemies.

name: Dunland: Survivors Story
summary: In this fantasy world overrun by monsters, survive and thrive in this roguelike game. Drawing inspiration from Vampires Survivors, enjoy a gripping story and challenging gameplay mechanics.

name: Dunlight: Random Defense
summary: Dunlight is a random defense game that combines the chess genre and the defense genre. Block monsters in the dungeon with your own choices in a situation of randomly given heroes, items, and options.

name: Dumb Ways to Die 4
summary:
Dumb Ways to Die 4 delivers even more of what you love: exciting and challenging minigames, new areas to explore, all your favorite Beans to rescue - and much, much more!

Challenge your friends and family to see who can survive the longest and become the ultimate champion of Dumb Ways to Die!

name: Dungeons & Degenerate Gamblers
summary: Battle your way through a seedy tavern filled with gambling addicted townspeople in this Blackjack Roguelike Adventure. From aces and face cards to tarot cards, business cards and more, create your unique deck to beat the house.

name: Dummb
summary: Dummb is a physics based VR game where you control other AIs, characters, avatars, vehicles and many other objects and use them to your advantage to solve unique, distinctive, and quirky puzzles and challenges.

name: Ducenti-Quinquaginta-Sexordle
summary: A daily word guessing game where players must guess 256 different hidden words. Each guess reveals information about the hidden words. Free play and historical replay modes are also available.

name: Duck's Despair
summary: Embark on a brutally hard platforming journey as a desperate Duck who cannot fly. Will you make the pain your friend or give up on your dreams ?

name: Dungeon Seekers
summary: Dungeon Seekers is a multiplayer VR dungeon adventure RPG featuring drop-in cooperative play, realistic physic interactions, engaging combat and climbing mechanics. Team up with your friends to fight monsters, loot treasures and upgrade & customize your equipment.

name: Dungeon Burglars
summary: Dungeon Burglars is a 'manual' tower defence game with a minimalist pixel art graphical style. Gameplay involves buying and placing traps and then tapping to activate them. The normal mode is quite short, so it's perfect for killing time on your commute.

name: Dunk City Dynasty
summary: Dunk City Dynasty is an NBA and NBPA licensed 3v3 streetball mobile game where you can takeover the streets with NBA superstars like Stephen Curry, Kevin Durant, Paul George, Luka Dončić, James Harden and many more! With different teams to choose from, you can dive into exciting game modes like 11-point, Full Court 5v5, and Ranked matches for hours of entertainment.

name: Dungeon Tycoon
summary: Build your own dungeon and attract heroes from all across the realm! Grow your business by capitalizing on every aspect of your visitor's dungeon-crawling experience. Will you be able to keep your evil business afloat?

name: Dungeon Merchant
summary: Buy and sell weapons, armour, potions and more to grow your humble shop. Hire adventurers and send them into the dungeon to collect loot for you. You've got a debt to pay to the king and in order to pay it, you're going to have to buy low, sell high and hope your hired heroes make it out alive.

name: Dungeons & Keyboards
summary: Ready your typing skills and defeat the quirky enemies of the Tower of Verbum. Collect coins, relics, and experience to buy items, assign stats and unlock permanent upgrades. How far will your typing skills take you?

name: Dungeons of the Obelisk
summary: A 2D, turn based, dungeon crawling, loot grinding adventure.

name: Dungeons of Eternity
summary:
Endless fantasy action and adventure await in Dungeons of Eternity. Band together with up to 4 players or play solo using physics-based weapons and magic in this cooperative action RPG built for VR.

Randomly-generated dungeons constructed from hundreds of different chambers offer endless replayability. Explore dark crypts, ruined castles, deep caverns, solve puzzles, and avoid deadly traps.

name: Dungeon Boss: Respawned
summary: Battle. Explore. Defend. Summon a crew of mighty heroes to guard your dungeons, steal treasure and fight foes. Assemble a team of warriors, goblins and other mighty heroes to embark on an epic adventure across fantasy lands.

name: Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered
summary:
Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered is only available as part of Evercade's Duke Nukem Collection 1, planned for release in November 2023.

A new collection of the original Duke Nukem games that has been developed by Blaze Entertainment. Featuring multiple improvements to the early 90s computer classic including 60fps gameplay, upscaled graphics, parallax background and smooth scrolling, along with re-recorded music, a redesigned HUD, and widescreen support. With the ability to play the games as they were originally also included.

name: Dungeon of Destiny
summary: Dungeon of Destiny is a roguelike where instead of loot you get to choose personality traits for your hero. Combine them into classes and more. Shape your behavior, looks and fighting style. Face consequences and find your destiny!

name: Dungeons & Dropped Things
summary: Ever wondered what happens to all that loot that is left behind when heroes are fighting their way through the dungeons? Well, worry no more, because, in Dungeons & Dropped Things, it is your job to reconnect lost loot with confused, annoying, and loot-hungry players.

name: Dunk Dunk
summary: Dunk with or on your friends in Dunk Dunk, a multiplayer action basketball arcade party game full of chaotic fun. Familiar platforming controls plus unique stretchy arm controls make for nail-bitingly tough matches. Dress up your dunker and get ready to dunk across the universe!

name: Dubai Simulator
summary: In Dubai Simulator, you'll have the chance to design and build your dream city, complete with towering skyscrapers, bustling streets, luxurious resorts, and awe-inspiring landmarks.

name: Duke Nukem Collection 1
summary:
He's back! Duke Nukem debuts on Evercade with this first collection, including the brand new Duke Nukem 1 + 2 Remastered!

Tackle the forces of Dr. Proton and fight off the evil Rigelatins in this rebuilt anthology of the first two Duke Nukem games. Then take the leap to 3D with the first person classic, Duke Nukem 3D: Total Meltdown. All presented here on one physical Evercade Cartridge and including a full colour manual.

name: Duke Nukem Collection 2
summary:
Duke Nukem Collection 2 takes a deeper look into the history of the Duke Nukem Franchise!

Enter the third person world of Duke Nukem's adventures with Time to Kill and its sequel Land of the Babes. Then enjoy the handheld first person marvel that is Duke Nukem Advance, a completely original story. All available on one Evercade Cartridge with a full colour manual included.

name: Duke Nukem Remastered
summary: A remaster by Blaze Entertainment as part of Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered which is set to be released exclusively for Evercade in Duke Nukem Collection 1.

name: Duke Nukem II Remastered
summary: A remaster by Blaze Entertainment as part of Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered which is set to be released exclusively for Evercade in Duke Nukem Collection 1.

name: Dungeon Rebound
summary: Dungeon Rebound is the perfect blend of nostalgic arcade gameplay and immersive RPG elements, offering a fresh and exciting take on both genres. Are you ready to rebound your way to victory and become a legend in the realm of Dungeon Rebound?

name: Dungeon and Craft
summary: In this adventure with a total of 6 weapons, you will produce your own weapons and turn the mushrooms you collect from the forest into pots that you can sell. In the dungeons, you will fight against challenging creatures for 16 waves and improve your character.

name: Dungeon Mutation
summary: Warriors trapped in the dungeon, challenging the constantly changing environment of the dungeon

name: Dungeon Knight
summary: You will play as a brave knight, exploring underground mazes, completing various challenges. Each level in the game is the ultimate platform jumping experience, requiring your precise calculation of jump timing and distance, dodging danger, and finally reaching the finish line.

name: Dungeon Breakout: Chapter 1
summary: A short dungeon crawler rpg where you have to fight your way through enemies and solve puzzles to find your way home.

name: Dungeon & Tales: Warriors and Dragons
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting world with this innovative interactive fantasy novel! Which path will you take? You decide the destiny and the end of the story!

name: Dungeon Full Dive
summary: Gather your party and play your favorite tabletop RPGs. With DFD, you can bring your fantasy worlds to life! Create and customize your own heroes & maps. Experience your adventures from the eyes of your miniature or using a classical TTRPG top-down mode!

name: Dungeon Abyss
summary:
Dungeon Abyss is a turn based rogue-lite procedural dungeon crawler, in which you can explore various worlds trying to regain the lost light that was stolen, to reestablish the balance and discover your true nature in the process.
Several procedural generated worlds, the game is still in beta, new worlds and features will be added in future releases, thank you for your comprehension and support.
You can also have fun in the creation mode in which you can create your own dungeon, with the resources unlocked while exploring worlds.

name: Dungeon Restaurant
summary:
In the deep dungeons somewhere.. A place where adventurers quench their thirst…
The store hours are from 12 A.M. to 12 P.M... People cal this store the "Dungeon Delicacy". All dishes are made with the monsters that live in this dungeon.
Do customers come? More than you think...

name: Duck Life 9: The Flock
summary: Raise your ducklings into the ultimate team of racers in Duck Life 9, where everything is bigger, bolder & more beautiful than ever before! Embark on a quest as you journey across the huge Featherhaven Island, meeting new friends & taking on recruits to help topple the competition & take the crown!

name: Duke Burger
summary: After saving mankind, Duke Nukem retired. He opened a little restaurant, Duke Burger. And now he is an honest businessman.

name: Dungeonborne
summary: Dungeonborne is an immersive first-person PvPvE dungeon crawler. Team up with trusted companions to hunt for treasure, explore dangerous dungeons, face terrifying monsters and other cunning adventurers alike, and escape before being consumed by darkness and greed.

name: Dungeon Journey
summary: Dungeon Journey is a dungeon-themed endless runner game featuring obstacle jumping and slime combat in a highly minimalist design.

name: Dungeon No Dungeon: Tyrant's Endgame
summary: A casual strategy game that integrates match-three puzzles, rougelike, and deck-building mechanics, set in the world of 'Dungeon No Dungeon'.

name: Dust and Aliens
summary: Play a space cowboy as he travels to an alien-filled arena, traversing the various game rooms to achieve the highest possible score and challenge the ultimate Dust and Aliens enemy!

name: Duke Nukem 3D: Fallout Freeze
summary:
Duke Nukem 3D: Fallout Freeze — is a mod that includes one level for Duke Nukem 3D Atomic Edition with custom art and code. It’s a Christmas themed mod whose main task is to bring a holiday atmosphere, but keep the vanilla style.

The level takes place in a captured by the aliens shopping mall “Queen's Mall”. Although the first part of the map is linear, the second part is designed for fully free exploration.

name: DUI
summary:
DUI is a world full of blocks. To pass the level, you should remove required amount of blocks and get the left blocks stay inactive(NOT ON GRAY BLOCK).
Furthermore, we strongly recommend that you get your hands wet with the level editor through which you can create your own blocks world and then share the levels you made with your friends.

name: Duck Hunt Remake
summary: A clone of Duck Hunt, popular classic NES game, for PSVITA/PSTV.

name: Dunia: The North Wood
summary: In this action-adventure RPG, explore a strange and futuristic island-city as Secret Police Captain Aeydrien Mason-Northwood. Become a Villain, Hero, or something in between as you deal with the island's various problems in any way you see fit.

name: Dungeon Defenders: Hermit Hero
summary: The Hermit joins the heroes of Etheria! Harness the elements to take on the Old One's army!

name: Dusklight Manor
summary: You are a young man that was offered a great opportunity for a new job and you decide to take it. You arrive at the Dusklight Manor to begin your new life and work, here you meet three wonderful girls that are under the tutelage of Mistress Clara, an enigmatic figure with more secrets than you can imagine. The girls you meet are Lizzie Monroe, Mary Best, and Lola Mod and you can build up relationships with each of them, depending on who you like more. While working around the house you notice Mistress Clara using a sort of magic on the house butler to make him younger but you set that aside, believing you are imagining things...​

name: Ducks Can Drive
summary: Ducks like to race, even in their own cars! Earn money by delivering food to fellow ducks in the city, then use this money to upgrade your vehicle. The better the vehicle, the better chance you have to win the race at the end of the day!

name: Dual Chroma
summary: Journey alongside the Second Prince of the Galens Empire to unlock ancient secrets in this romantic fantasy adventure visual novel with a dark twist. With multiple endings and immersive battle sequences, will you write your own destiny, or repeat the mistakes of those whom history has forgotten?

name: Dual
summary: Otome game included in the Story Me app.

name: Dungeon Stalkers
summary: Dungeon Stalkers is a PVEVP dungeon crawler game where you can experience the joy of exploration and survival in a classic RPG. Join forces with your companions to defeat other adventurers and monsters, and acquire equipment and treasures. Then, escape safely from the witch's curse!

name: Dust Devil
summary:
Dust Devil is a single player mission for GZDoom spread across two intertwined maps.

You have been sent to a UAC outpost on a desert world to recover a mysterious artefact. Expect heavy resistance and some new surprises.

Featuring new textures by Ukiro and music by Jimmy.

Jumping and crouching are disabled.

name: Dungeons and Demons
summary: Dungeons and Demons is an 8-map limit-removing episode for Doom II from various members of Doomer Boards. In the words of adventuresmith @xvertigox, this month's project lead, Dungeons and Demons "is an one shot DND campaign played one slow Sunday afternoon on a dingy UAC base. Can you find the Daikantana Staff and make it out with your life? Will you try to take on the BBEG too early and end up having to re-roll your character? Grab your die and lets find out."

name: Dubai
summary: tech-base with a varied theming, mid-sized, generally nonlinear, less puzzle-like

name: Dumb Ways to Climb
summary: Get ready for a game that'll make you question all your life choices! Introducing "Dumb Ways to Climb" - the incredibly unimpressive creation that miraculously appeared in just one week! Watch in awe as our brilliant Bean aimlessly climbs on random stuff, reaching for the stars... well, kind of.

name: Dungeons of Blood and Dream
summary: Play as a mighty blood wizard on a quest to escape a death-loop of psychedelic dungeons. Slay disgusting creatures with a large array of bladed weapons and unnerving spells, harness the power of cursed rings, find mysterious treasures, and learn the secrets of the universe you are trapped in.

name: Dungeon Survivors
summary: Dungeon Survivors is a top-down fantasy roguelite where you can use your class abilities to fight off a horde of fantasy monsters. Choose from a variety of abilities and items to create unique builds and survive with 1-4 players.

name: Dungeon of the Forgotten King
summary: The game is mainly focused on combat, where you must defeat enemies to obtain Gold and Loot. Gold is your most valuable resource, as it is used as an offering at the Magic Altars for your character to level up, heal wounds or change classes, or to pay merchants to buy equipment. Manage your resources well, upgrade your character and defeat the Dungeon Master to find the way out!

name: Dum Game
summary: Experience the exhilaration of Dum Game, a competitive multiplayer party sensation! Outmatch your rivals in thrilling rounds to claim victory and become the ultimate champion.

name: Dustgrave
summary: Embark on an epic journey, enjoying complete freedom in a dynamic sandbox RPG. The world and its inhabitants will witness your deeds and react accordingly, adapting the narrative to your choices and delivering a truly unique and free experience.

name: Duskbound
summary:
Made for Otome Jam 2023.

Gothic horror otome with a yandere vampire LI.

name: DumbSquad
summary: Fight and survive in this post-apocalyptic world, infested by wild mutated monsters! Challenge your skill as a Hunter against these dangerous beasts!

name: Dungeon's Anima
summary: Dungeon's Anima is an Action Roguelite for up to 4 players where you play as the Shadowmancer, the last undead foot-soldier now imbued with the final vestiges of the Dungeon Heart's power; collect the souls of your enemies to reclaim your dominion from the hands of the Human Empire.

name: Dungeon Evolution: Nemesis
summary: Face the ever-evolving Nemesis, utilizing your character's skills and attributes to overcome challenges. Explore the mysterious dungeon, encounter thrilling events, and make strategic decisions. Are you ready to embark on an endless adventure in "Dungeon Evolution: Nemesis"?

name: Dungeon Descent
summary: Brace yourself for a thrilling co-op adventure! Delve into the depths of perilous dungeons, face the undead onslaught, and carve your own medieval legend. Craft, strategize, survive - "Will you conquer the darkness?"

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Mists of Ravenloft
summary: Mists of Ravenloft is DDO's third expansion. The expansion will immerse you in one of the most infamous D&D adventure settings. Save the people of Barovia, slay Strahd, and restore balance to the land. The stakes have never been higher!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Masterminds of Sharn
summary: Masterminds of Sharn is DDO's forth expansion. It gives the player the ability to travel from Stormreach to the city of Sharn on the continent of Khorvaire. It also adds the Masterminds of Sharn adventure pack. The chain involves the recovery of the item that was recovered in the quest that was added in Update 41, while avoiding a conflict with the Aurum, the Boromar Clan, and Sharn's city council. The expansion also added the teifling race, the teifling scoundrel iconic race, and the inquisitive enhancement tree.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Fables of the Feywild
summary: Fables of the Feywild is DDO's fifth expansion. Journey to the land of myth and fable, a place of wonder and death in Dungeons & Dragons Online: Fables of the Feywild. Meet the Archfey, mighty beings who may help or hinder you on your adventures. Encounter majestic Unicorns, mischievous Pixies, deadly Displacer Beasts, and fierce Fomorians in this all new expansion!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Sinister Secret of Saltmarsh
summary: Sinister Secret of Saltmarsh mini-expansion was introduced in Update 50. An evil Alchemist's mansion stands alone on a cliff and mysterious lights and hauntings have kept people away despite rumors of great treasure.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Isle of Dread
summary: The Isle of Dread expansion for Dungeons & Dragons Online, also known as Update 55. The expansion is built around a beloved classic D&D adventure and features an increased level cap, a new playable race, new character-building options, monsters, and more.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Vecna Unleashed
summary:
The mini-expansion introduces a climax to The Codex of the Infinite Planes Saga, where players must face the sinister presence of Vecna and his cult in Morgrave University.

Vecna Unleashed offers new adventures in various locations, including Sharn, the Plane of Water, the Abyss, and the Astral Plane. Players will battle against new monsters such as humanoid rodent Wererats and abyssal demonic Vrocks, while also unlocking a new Epic Destiny called the Machrotechnic.

name: Duas Vidas
summary:
The year is 2032, Brazil has suffered a coup d'état in which a president supported by a fundamentalist militia has taken over the country.
Paulo and Júlia, two young black people from a fictional ghetto in a fictional city in a future that is, unfortunately, getting closer and closer to reality, have to make decisions in a single day that can impact the rest of their lives as well as the millions of people around them. And who will make those decisions? You.

name: Dual Chroma: Haereticus
summary:
As a scribe, you serve in subterranean tombs. You once adored a different version of Him before His transformation. Now, as He calls you to the Cerean Hall, how will you respond?

A glimpse into the shadows of Aradal ages past. Haereticus is short experience set in the Dual Chroma universe made for OA2A jam.

name: Ducky Bouncy
summary: Embark on an exciting journey in a bubble to get to help a duckling you found who has lost its familly.

name: Dungeon Tale
summary: Adventures in the random dungeons, with a AI parters and healers, looting items from ordinary to legendary levels. and after full level, there will be Heroic and Legendary dungeons, or even epic raids of world bosses awaits.

name: Dust Raiders
summary: Dust Raiders is a management strategy game, set in a lawless wasteland. Upgrade your vehicles, engage in tactical fights against raiders hunting for your resources and gather a crew to rule the area.

name: Dustland
summary: Dustland is a significantly new look on survival. It's a shooter where escapes, looting, and battles are just a veil hiding the world's mysteries. It's a captivating adventure from a dozen seasons, where uncovering the truth will change everything. Only a few will be able to reach the real answers…

name: Dumbriel: Magnificent Adventure in Hell
summary: Embark on an epic journey through Dante's 9 circles of hell as clumsy angel Dumbriel, whose mission is to reclaim the souls you lost. Explore angelic and infernal skills, collect shards, craft elixirs, and battle formidable creatures in this Metroidvania-style action adventure.

name: Dungeon Crawl Tower Run
summary: Single player 3D action roguelike extraction game. Create unique builds out of various combinations of skills and equipments to reach the 6th floor of the Tower!

name: Dungeon Cleaner
summary: Clean and slide endlessly. Dungeon cleaner

name: Duke Nukem Forever: Restoration Project
summary: The DNF2001 Restoration Project was created roughly a day or two after the August 21, 2001 and October 26, 2001 versions of Duke Nukem Forever; dated a whole 10 years before the release of the final game, were leaked by x0r_jmp on the /v/ board of 4chan. This resulted in a flurry of renewed interest in Duke and the game itself; and quickly attracted both vets and new blood alike interested in modifying the game's source code.

name: Dungeon Synths
summary: Dungeon Synths is a 9+1 map musical odyssey from the Digital Bards Krew, merging the worlds of medieval fantasy and vintage synthesizers. This is the first of (hopefully) many bimonthly ZDoom-oriented community projects organized by several veterans of the DBP series, run on the ZDoom forums. The project targets ZDoom 2.8.1 but has also been tested with recent GZDoom versions. Dungeon Synths features an ogg soundtrack of music from classic RPGs, particularly Legend of Dragoon and Dark Cloud 2, newly arranged for (virtual) vintage synthesizers and drum machines.

name: Dungeon Heroes
summary: An action-packed local co-op multiplayer dungeon crawler with a 3D cel-shaded art style.

name: Dungeon Survival
summary: A side-scrolling, turn-based character development game, where you play as a lord leading your heroes to brave the depths of dungeons.

name: Dumpster Date
summary: Time to grab some limbs and play human for your upcoming date!

name: Duke War!!
summary: Rally peasants to chop down trees and discover hidden gold. Take the gold to your dower; when the tower is full the greedy king will collect his prize - bestowing you with 100 points.

name: Duo Runner 3D
summary: Friends, let's run together.

name: Duke Nukem 3D
summary:
Duke Nukem 3D for Android and iOS is an authorized Duke Nukem 3D port developed by MachineWorks Northwest and published by Tapjoy.
Apart from its unique control scheme, the Android/iOS version is largely unchanged from the PC version, though there is no in-game music outside the main menu.

name: Duke Nukem 3D
summary: Duke Nukem 3D for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis is a console port of the desktop PC/MS-DOS game Duke Nukem 3D. The port is profoundly different from the original game.

name: Duke Nukem 3D
summary: The Sega Saturn version of Duke Nukem 3D is a 1997 port that was developed by Lobotomy Software and published by Sega. Instead of the classic Build engine, the port uses Lobotomy Software's own game engine, SlaveDriver, which is notable for its use of dynamic lighting.

name: Duke Nukem 3D
summary: Xbox Live Arcade port of Duke Nukem 3D.

name: Dungeon Inn
summary: The turn-based stategy management game giving the delightful tension. The Player opened an inn for two guilds with the dungeon just around the corner. Let's make a lot of money. The two guilds are hostile, but it's OK if they don't get caught!

name: Dungeon of Horror
summary: Dungeon of Horror - a 2D-pixel dungeon labyrinth, where you play as a girl trying to find the way out and discover all the dark corners of this frightening place. Watch your steps, avoid traps, collect all loot and escape the dungeon!

name: Dui
summary: Help Dui find his way home in this challenging puzzle-adventure. Fight bosses, discover new abilities, and learn more about this quirky character on your journey home.

name: Dune: Imperium
summary:
In Dune: Imperium, you'll step into the role of one of the leaders of the Great Houses of the Imperium in a struggle to control the planet Arrakis and the invaluable Spice it provides.

The game plays out in a series of ten rounds, each of which is defined by a new Conflict on the surface of the planet; some award critical resources, and some provide Victory Points that will propel you to dominance. But choose your battles wisely: spread your forces too thin, and you'll find your enemies growing too strong to oppose.

Each round, you'll draw a hand of five cards from your deck, which will get stronger over the course of the game as you acquire new cards. Each card can be played in one of two ways: To send an Agent out into the Imperium to gather resources, or to Reveal at the end of the round to purchase new powerful cards. You must maintain a careful balance to get the most of the resources available to you. How will you find your path?

As your game progresses, you'll vie for Influence with four factions of the Imperium: The Emperor, the economically powerful Spacing Guild, the mysterious Bene Gesserit, and the ferocious Fremen of the deep deserts. Earning Influence among the various groups helps you to earn the Victory Points you need...but will you compete with your rivals for their favor, or abandon alliances to pursue other opportunities?

Many strategies are at your disposal, and many paths to victory. The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

name: Dungeon Defenders: The Tinkerer's Lab Mission Pack
summary: Embedded within the floating islands of Sky City, the Tinkerer's Lab is the birthplace of the Series EV. Her creator, the Tinkerer, has been preparing for a chasis & software upgrade to EV 1.5, but harnessing the Eternia energy has attracted unwanted attention!

name: Dungeons and Female Teachers
summary: As a female teacher, you found a crack leading to a different world in the classroom. You entered the different world through the crack. You found that there are many dangerous creatures in the different world. In order to protect the school from being invaded, you decided to destroy these monsters.

name: Ducks Can Drive: Penguins Can Too
summary: After the ducks taught the penguins how to drive, they are now comfortable enough to face the ducks in racing! With this DLC you will be able to drive as a penguin on top of your standard duck choices. Who will win, Ducks or Penguins? Penguins Can Drive Too!

name: Duskborn
summary: Duskborn is a 3rd-person rouge-like game. Descend into the Abyss as fast as possible, level up by defeating various enemies, collect and combine items to upgrade your player. Maneuver through the Abyss with your jetpack and grappling hook. The race against time is on.

name: Dungeon Create
summary: Roused from sleep, I'm in a dusty cave, named the master of a dungeon!? I'm "forced" to manage it... Defend against daring adventurers!

name: Duckball
summary: Duckball is an action-packed battle royale game where up to 100 players compete to be the last duck standing. Play with friends online and collect wacky items to knock your opponents off the stage in an ever changing 3D environment. Do you have what it takes to be truly glorious?

name: Dualis
summary: Dualis is a sci-fi horror thriller whose story takes you to an underground research complex. You will have to fight not only for your life, but also to understand if you really exist. What is consciousness and personality are the questions you will have to ask yourself.

name: Duckstazy Classic
summary: While Duck is jumping too high, that time to examine your skills. Collect smiles and avoid bad trip guys to beat your friends!

name: Durak Online
summary: Durak online - the favorite card game. The object of the game is to get rid of all one's cards. At the end of the game, the last player with cards in their hand is referred to as the fool (durak - Дурак).

name: Dungeoneers Academy
summary:
Updated for faster, real-time play. Improved frame rate results in much faster and smoother movement in line with faster rogues and runners. A new real-time combat system allows better control and tuning, but you can still let go of all game controls to pause the action.
Dungeons are redesigned for quicker rogue-like play with a much stronger boss, and his cronies, waiting at the very end. Dungeon layouts, monsters and treasure are all randomized for replayability, and dungeons fill with more monsters as you level up.
You have tons of options. Choose Fighter, Ranger or Wizard. Each requires a different strategy. Also pick Human, Elf, Dwarf or Halfling, as well as gender. Then the Academy Store is always available with a huge selection of armor, weapons and spells to customize your unique hero.
Treasure and experience have been tuned for faster leveling and more equipment purchases to try things out. The Academy has also been shortened to get you into the real world faster.
Missions have also been revamped, but you still have the hero quest to become Hero of the Land. You can use missions to gain coins needed for a purchase, or experience required for the next level. You will also find missions with special equipment rewards.
Now create your hero candidate, graduate with honors, and venture out to beat back the invading horde and their ferocious masters.

name: Dung Beetle Adventure
summary: A short (and free) adventure game, where you are tasked with helping a hurt, hungry, but inventive dung beetle on its journey to find something to eat near the end of the mushroom season.

name: Dunk The Hoops: Bouncy Ball
summary: With simple one tap gameplay which is easy to learn but hard to master. Bounce around and try to slam dunk as many hoops as you can.

name: Dungeon Croaker
summary: Dungeon Croaker is a frog themed turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler. Navigate randomly generated dungeon floors, find and synergize relic effects, fight enemies with unique abilities, avoid dangerous environmental hazards, and defeat powerful dungeon bosses.

name: Dungeon 3D
summary: The ultimate 3D Virtual Tabletop, Dungeon 3D is light-weight, incredibly easy to use, and extremely robust. It has everything you could possibly need to run full sessions, create gorgeous 3D maps, access character sheets, initiative, dice rolling, animated and customizable avatars, and so much more!

name: Dungeons and Monsters
summary: An episode for Heretic replacing the original first for Limit-removing ports. Made on the basis of different images from google for the query "dungeons maps". There are some textures from Hexen, Hexen II, Heretic II, Witchaven and a few of their own.

name: Dual Bus Simulator
summary: Experience the thrill of being a bus driver in "Dual Bus Simulator."

name: Dunchess
summary: Master the art of turn-based chess mechanics in ever-changing dungeons! Navigate bridges, teleporters, and more as you strategize your way to victory in this unique chess roguelike adventure. Plus, create your own maps and explore others' creations!

name: Durarara!! 3way Standoff: Alley
summary: Durarara!! 3way standoff -alley- is the director's cut version of the 2010 PSP game Durarara!! 3way standoff. While the gameplay remains unchanged from the original, 3way standoff -alley- features a "what if" scenario as well as downloadable content. The downloadable content includes cosplay for the characters

name: Dusk HD
summary: A full visual remaster of DUSK.

name: Dungeons and Goblins
summary: Small Hero, Big Adventures - Craft Your Destiny!

name: Duke It's Zero Hour
summary: Duke It's Zero Hour is a total conversion for Duke Nukem 3D. The project was developed by ZeroHour Software and released on November 1, 1997. It features new levels, weapons, enemies, music, sound effects, and even an original boss. Duke It's Zero Hour is sometimes purported to have been an officially authorized expansion that was originally slated for retail sale via WizardWorks, but these claims are disputed.

name: Dukem Memorial Hospital
summary: Dukem Memorial Hospital is invaded by aliens.

name: Duke!Zone II
summary: Duke!Zone II is an expanded 1997 re-release of Duke!ZONE and an authorized expansion pack for Duke Nukem 3D. Duke!ZONE II introduces three original episodes by Simply Silly Software. Although removed from the Kill-A-Ton Collection version, the original Duke!ZONE II also included the 500 user maps from the first Duke!ZONE.

name: Dungeon: Cradle of Hell
summary: Hell does exist after all! And if you want to return home, you will have to pass this test and clear your way with weapons!

name: Dust Front RTS
summary: Dust Front is a real-time strategy game that blends classic RTS mechanics with grand strategy elements. Players engage in military operations across barren battlefields using varied tactics from mass infantry deployment to strategic bombing raids. The game features a non-linear campaign where players choose their path through different military scenarios and strategic decisions.

name: Dungeon Girl
summary: A challenging 2D side-scroller RPG game where you have only one life and death is permanent. Survive 40 interchangeable levels with your wits and consumables to get the Amulet of Yendor and escape the Dungeon with it.

name: Duel, In Towers
summary: Small medieval-style level with two towers in a canyon. The map source is included.

name: Duke 23:4
summary: This picks up where Duke 3:16 left off after Duke escapes through the railroad tunnel.

name: Dukai
summary: street-map, inside and outside a chinese/japanese restaurant

name: Duel of Honor
summary: Duel of Honor is a dynamic battle on flying motorcycles, a gloomy atmosphere, bright music and memorable gameplay. The victory will be yours!

name: Dubai Builder
summary: Dubai Builder is a strategy game in which you build, develop and manage a city in the desert and are responsible for all aspects related to it and struggle with difficult climatic conditions.

name: Dungeon Adventure Gang
summary: Dungeon Adventure Gang is a co-op top-down multiplayer roguelike where you and three other adventurers team up to explore this unmarked dungeon as far as possible. Explore, gear up, reunite, and push on.

name: Dungeons 4: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full Dungeons 4 game,the digital artbook and soundtrack, nostalgic Dungeons 3 skins for Thalya and your Evil Hand, as well as a remaster of the classic Dungeons 3 map "The Storming of Dollaran".

name: Dungeon Bar: Gachi Puzzles
summary: Dungeon Bar is a classic puzzle game in neonoir style. You will have to piece by piece collect pictures of legendary personalities of the Gachimuchi...

name: Dusty Crib
summary: Dusty Crib is a hidden object game. Slow gameplay will allow you to concentrate on searching and finding all the necessary things from the list to complete the level. Look more carefully as many items end up in the most unexpected places.

name: Duludubi Star
summary: A promotional 3D platformer released in 2008 that ties in to FantaWild's theme parks. The game has you control Duludubi, a blue dinosaur who's one of the company's mascots, as he ventures through 5 themed worlds to save his sister, Duluduni, from the evil Dr. Octopus.

name: Duet Night Abyss
summary: Duet Night Abyss is a fantasy adventure RPG with a high degree of freedom developed by Hero Games' Pan Studio. The game features "multiple weapon loadouts & 3D combat" at its core, and tells the story of "Demons" from dual perspectives.

name: Duke Nukem Is 007
summary: While intended to become a James Bond TC, this project was never finished. However, 6 really nice maps remained. You will visit interesting locations like a flying plane, an underwater base or a Russian missile silo.

name: Duke is Ten
summary: A group of premier mappers from the community had just three days to create a set of maps centered on the theme "ten" to celebrate DukeNukem3D's 10 year release anniversary.

name: Duke in Los Angeles
summary: Duke travels to L.A to clear out remaining aliens, 11 levels, new textures and weapons and many new sounds.

name: Dukeland
summary: The aliens stole Disneyland and brought it into space! Duke has to bring it back to Earth in this short (1h) fun ride through 2 detailed levels. Sightseeing and action merge!

name: Duke Royale Remake
summary: Replica of E4L4 for the PSX-exclusive episode "Plug 'n' Pray

name: DukeVR
summary: DukeVR's idea is simple: Three episodes, eighteen levels, three colors (blue, green and red) and lots of nasty puzzles. Levels are short - shortest (simplest) levels take about twenty seconds while bigger & more complex ones take more than a minute.

name: Duke Lost Episodes
summary: Contains 40 new levels, The 4 Lost Episodes of Duke Nukem, way back when he was still working for the CIA (see Duke Nukem I). Apparently, before the fight with Dr. Proton, he had fought off an alien invasion of Earth (though more in secrecy), the selfsame ones that tried again later during Duke Nukem 3D.

name: Dungeon Hunter 6
summary:
Thrilling Gameloft ARPG Sequel!
Unite, fearless Bounty Hunters, and embrace Dungeon Hunter VI - a unique and enthralling hack-and-slash odyssey that continues the cherished saga. Enter uncharted territories, reunite with iconic characters, and experience a new level of excitement in this extraordinary installment!

Return to the Valenthia 200 years after the brave sacrifice of the Bounty Hunter and experience brand new thrilling adventures, in a scale never seen before in a Dungeon Hunter Game.

name: Duplex
summary: A big split techbase designed for Torn's Doom Advent Calendar 2005 day 7

name: Dusky Depths
summary: After a routine expedition gone awry, you are stranded on an uncharted planet inhabited by odd creatures and rundown machinery. Upgrade your ship, scavange for rare loot and unlock ancient mechanisms to survive on this strange and hostile place – alone or together with your friends.

name: Dungeonpreneur
summary: Run a bustling tavern and a thriving item shop in a fantasy world built around dungeons and the bountiful resources they have to offer! Go on adventures, befriend lovable locals, build a successful business, and perhaps even become the greatest Dungeonpreneur that ever lived!

name: Duke Nukem Quake
summary: Small city themed level, a remake of the first level of Duke Nukem 3D + custom start map.

name: Dungeon Core Master
summary: Adult-Only Fantasy Visual Novel featuring 3 girls, a variety of choices, comedy, and sex in an exciting story with different endings!

name: Dusk Till Dawn
summary: Dusk Till Dawn is a Friday Night Funkin' mod featuring a corrupted version of Twilight Sparkle facing off against Boyfriend & Pibby.

name: Dust Breeding
summary: Develop your true self-knowledge!

name: Dungeon Minesweeper
summary: Dungeon Minesweeper is a unique roguelike based on a minesweeper! Explore the dungeon, bypass the bombs, defeat the boss and get out of the dungeon!

name: Dungeons Deep
summary: Plunge into the Dungeons Deep! A dark-fantasy ARPG featuring vast underworlds full of horrifying monsters and ancient treasures. Liberate the old lands of Antioch for those who still remain.

name: Dusty Derby
summary: Dusty Derby is a large online multiplayer party royal game with 32 players. Cute Dusts Compete to be King of Dusts in various places in the house!

name: Dungeon Man
summary: A bullet-hell dungeon game where you use colored gems to match the enemy in order to deal damage. Each enemy type has a unique attack style. Shoot and Dodge as you search for the evil toilet snake which lies deep within the dungeon.

name: Duck's Most Terrible Day
summary: A time-bending 2D platformer in the least amount of pixels possible.

name: Dungeon 3D: Eastern
summary: The Eastern Theme pack contains over 100 new assets to build a glorious Eastern village, city, temple, or cultural battle scene. It contains a multitude of fun new props to really make your worlds come to life, built to work seamlessly together in Dungeon 3D!

name: Dungeon Re-Delve
summary: A top down roguelike dungeon crawler with unique and powerful items. Endless procedurally generated dungeons and levels.

name: Duplicity Loop
summary: A dark magical girl VN that takes place in an Alice in Wonderland inspired world.

name: Dumball Rush
summary: Dumball Rush is an online racing party game from 2 to 8 players with a 3D third person view. The player controls a snowball that is racing against other players. Roll in the snow to be bigger and faster! Avoid obstacles and activate gifts to take advantage and win the race!

name: Dungeon Vixens: A Tale of Temptation
summary: Will you mend your heart or be lost forever in a Vixen filled dungeon of lust and pleasure?

name: Dungeon Artifact
summary: Dungeon Artifact is a roguelike deck-builder game with authentic card game elements. 200+ cards offer the possibility to create new combos all the time. Build the most powerful deck by your own hands and overwhelm your enemies!

name: Duck Detective: The Secret Salami
summary: Solving crime is no walk in the pond. You are a down-on-his-luck detective who also happens to be a duck. Use your powers of de-duck-tion to inspect evidence, fill in the blanks, and bust the case wide open, in a narrative mystery adventure where nothing is quite as it seems.

name: Dude Simulator Six
summary: Dude Simulator Six is an open world sandbox game. A mortal danger looms over humanity. The planet was invaded by representatives of a distant planetary system.

name: Duck Tales ZX: Webby to the Rescue!
summary:
Uncle Scrooge with his nephews and Webby set off for the Carpathian country, where there is a long-abandoned old castle called Fort Cockroach. Legend says that untold riches are still kept there and no one has ever been able to find them. But, reaching the treasury in the dungeon of the castle, Scrooge and his nephews fall into a trap. Tired of waiting for anyone outside, Webby collects several stones by the river and decides to enter the old castle to find and save her friends.

Try to open the best ending and make Uncle Scrooge very happy with the treasures found.

name: Dungeons of Dragons
summary: "In an age of guns, swords, and magic, the Philosopher's Stone, which maintains the balance of Dungeons and Dragons, has been stolen. The world hangs in the balance. It's all up to you..."Honestly, we can't make it all up all the time. Let's have an adventure together!

name: DunJumb
summary: Whether you choose magic, swords, or both, make your way through the thousands of monsters attacking you! DunJumb is a colorful 2D medievial survivor game with roguelite elements, in which you create, buy and reinforce a combination of weapons against formidable enemies!

name: Durak NTR: the Fool who lost his gf in a card game
summary: Play a card game against a loan shark. Every win lowers your debt, but every loss has to be paid for... by your girlfriend.

name: Durak NTR: Doomed Romance Pack
summary: More girls to break your heart.

name: Dungeon Defence Simulator 2024
summary: Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the guardian of your pixelated realm?

name: Dungeon Ascension
summary: The conclusion of Chuma's original map saga.

name: Duke Nukem Forever
summary:
Prior to it's 2011 release, Duke Nukem Forever went through various different stages of development. The 1996 build of the game had a completely different style of gameplay compared to other builds of the game, where the game was intended to be a 2D side-scroller instead of a third person shooter.

On December 26, 2022, 4 prototype builds of the game was leaked onto 4Chan by x0r_jmp.

name: Dungeon Rummage: Rise of the Allies!
summary: Dungeon Rummage - Rise of the Allies is a short dungeon crawler created for the Harold Jam 2023, Ascend of the Allies. Pick your character and escape the dungeon, where the allies are currently held hostage.

name: Dusk Index: Gion
summary: Dusk Index: Gion is an upcoming psycho-suspense adventure game from Tokyo Dark creator Cherrymochi in collaboration with Bushiroad Games.

name: Dungeonoid 2: Awakening
summary: Classic dungeon crawling gets a block-busting twist in Dungeonoid 2 Awakening, a top-down adventure presented in retro pixel art style!

name: Dungeon Adventure Island
summary: A relaxed and casual 2D adventure game with the theme character of a bankrupt miner. A game that appears incredibly childish, with very simple controls that require simplicity, fun, and easy to get started.

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Mystara Eiyuu Senki
summary: This is a Japan-exclusive PlayStation 3 version of Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara. It was developed internally at Capcom by the original team, and features more accurate emulation than the worldwide release plus exclusive content.

name: Dum-Dum Thoughts
summary:
Sometimes thoughts are too loud
This is a set of 6 vent-y speedmaps that was made in 4 days. Mostly they're focused on atmosphere, so spending a bit of time on the map while listening to midi after killing the monsters will be worth it

name: Dune
summary: Based off the 1984 movie, Dune was to be an action/adventure game along the same lines the classic 2600 game Adventure. Dune was originally started by veteran programmers Bruce Poehlman and Gary Stark before they began working on the 5200 game "The Last Starfighter" (which also went unreleased). Unfortunately Gary and Bruce had only gone through the brainstorming process when work was stopped. However it appears that another programmer may have been assigned to pick up and continue work on Dune. Unfortunately only preliminary coding had been started before Jack Tramiel shut down 2600 game development and fired most of the staff.

name: Dusty At Home
summary: In this game you play as the little potato man, Dusty. He is a really chill and relaxed streamer, but things are gonna change for him. He is gonna fight himself trough a set of nightmares a which originated from his brothers disappearance. You have to survive 7 nightmares and after there is a custom night with challenges. There even are multiple endings to this game.

name: Dungeons and Dungeons
summary: Sadie and Max through a treacherous maze of levels (6 in all), fending off attacks from wandering dungeon-dwellers and mechanical pleasure-bots.

name: Dungeon Slasher
summary: Dungeon Slasher is a roguevania pixelated side-scrolling action game, where you battle powerful enemies and bosses in thrilling 2D combat, utilizing the weapons and skills of diverse characters.

name: Durium Hospital Lost Tape 95
summary: Durium Hospital Lost Tape 95 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror mixed with survival horror and the third entry in "The Lost Tapes" Series.

name: DURT
summary: Dig into this block-based puzzle game where you must master the elements of the subterranean world to rescue the miners trapped within. The deeper you delve, the more challenging the rescue becomes.

name: Dust Courier
summary: Dust Courier is a text game with pixel graphics and resource management. Navigate the wasteland using the map and face unpredictable situations. Make choices and deliver the cargo safely.

name: Duck Man
summary: Duck Man is a 2D platformer released for the Timetop GameKing. The game is a unlicensed clone of the NES game Darkwing Duck.

name: Dungeons & Dining Tables
summary: Dungeons and Dining Tables is a Cosy-RPG where you delve dungeons to collect rare furniture to decorate your house! The comfier your house. The better your stats!

name: Duck, Quack, Shoot!
