summary: Duck, Quack, Shoot! Is a fun party game styled like an old-fashioned mechanical carnival shooting gallery. Can you beat the ducks?

name: Dudelings: Arcade Sportsball
summary: Dudelings: Arcade Sportsball is a fast-paced sportslike. A cross between Pong and Foosball, this title brings high-energy local mutiplayer fun to the table!

name: Duskpunk
summary: A gritty dice-driven RPG, in a steampunk city. You escaped the War, but how to survive? Explore the city. Build up your skills. Decide who to trust. Choose carefully: you might just spark a revolution!

name: Dungeon
summary:
Dungeon is a game made by Scott Cawthon in 2003.

The only image of the game shows the sprites of some enemies and objects, among which a zombie, a stone cross and a skeleton of what looks like a dragon or a dinosaur stand out.

name: Dungeon Settlers
summary: A colony sim based dungeon crawler where you manage your clan to build a settlement in barren land, provide food and shelter for your people, lead them deep into the merciless dungeon, overcome challenging combat by your strategy.

name: Ducks in a Row
summary: Help Mama Duck navigate parks, factories, and more in this super cute puzzler, and bring all her baby ducks home!

name: Dump The Corpse
summary: It's a puzzle game, an action game, and a dark humour game that mixes a lot of gameplay. The game focuses on a housewife who is oppressed by life, since she married a husband who can't make money, her life is incredibly bad, so she can make the choice to kill him.

name: Dumb Castle
summary: The Dumb Castle is just made to bully players! Jump into the castle with your friends and get bullied by the various maps and levels waiting for you with some horror elements!

name: Dusty the Lazy Cat
summary: Dusty the Lazy Cat is a puzzle game where the main character Dusty goes through different worlds and levels. He must also deal with enemies and solve puzzles.

name: Dune: Spice Wars - House Vernius of Ix
summary: In the heart of the Ixian Confederation, House Vernius, masters of science and engineering, established itself as the Empire's primary supplier of cutting-edge technology. Adapting to the constraints of the Butlerian Jihad, they discreetly explore forbidden self-learning tech.

name: Dungeons & Dimensions
summary: Dungeons & Dimensions is a Looter Souls-Like made with Coop in mind. Travel through interesting Worlds and Dungeons alone or with friends, and gather epic loot on the way ! Beware the Simulation is unforgiving.

name: Dungeoning
summary:
Dungeoning is a fantasy incremental RPG tribute to all things adventuronious.
It combines incremental mechanics with a layer of deep secrets and discovery, so the game plays in your pocket but occupies your mind.
It's a nonstop mobile dungeon crawler that navigates like Snapchat but looks like pixel-art RPGs of olde.

name: Dungeon!
summary: Based on the board game of the same name by TSR Hobbies.

name: Dungeon
summary:
Koei’s Dungeon asks you to pick a class — Warrior, Thief, Cleric, Wizard or Ninja — and explore a large island in search of El Dorado.

While the towns are text-only, the rest of the game is an impressive programming featfor it's time, the overworld has a handy mini-map and the island’s underground is a dungeon with multiple entry points that’s over 250 x 250 squares.

You will face monsters based on the D&D rulebooks: Mind Flayers, Frost Giants, Flesh Golems and even the demon prince Demogorgon.

name: Duck Dash
summary: "Duck Dash" is a top-down arena shooter roguelite game. Players take on the role of a little duck and embark on a journey of growth, strategically selecting optimal skill combinations to become a mighty warrior.

name: Duel with the Devil
summary: Win the duel with the devil and save the city

name: Duck, Duck, Shoot
summary: In this action roguelike shooter you lead an flock of ducks in a vibrant 3D isometric world. Your feathered friends will follow your every move, unleashing their unique attacks on your foes. Navigate through challenging landscapes and face formidable bosses as you upgrade your ducks along the way.

name: Dungeon of Stone
summary: You just woke up and you don't know who or where you are. How did you get to this place? How are you going to get out? Make your way through hallways full of enemies and traps, discover who you are and find a way to escape.

name: Dungeon Exiles
summary: Conquer the darkness in Dungeon Exiles, an autobattler roguelike set in a dark fantasy world. Descend into the procedurally generated dungeon, level up, unlock synergies and acquire powerful items as you fight for survival against the tides of darkness!

name: Dungeon Clawler
summary: Dungeon Clawler is a Roguelike Claw Machine Deckbuilder. Build your unique deck, fight enemies by grabbing weapons and items from a claw machine and find special artifacts that help you on your quest to reclaim something you lost... Aim carefully to claw your way through this dungeon!

name: Dungeons & Cardboard
summary: Dungeons & Cardboards is a Tactical RPG / Dungeons Crawler inspired by Role Playing games. Follow the POV of a group of 4 players, against the supreme Cardboard Master, and crush his big bad Boss, by stuffing yourself in his dungeons, populated by dubious enemies, and handmade decorations.

name: Dustmen
summary: Dustmen is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game. Set in plague times, the King has commanded you to sanitize and remove clutter from abandoned places to prevent the plague from spreading. Yet, be careful and keep an eye out for creatures around you.

name: Dungeons and Diners
summary: Dungeon and Diners: A Culinary Adventure Awaits! Dive into dungeons with your friends, hunting for exotic ingredients to bring back to your bustling diner. Choose to team up with up to 4 players or enlist the help of adventurers for both dungeon delving and diner duties.

name: Dungeon Walk 2: Konton no Kamigami
summary: The world is once again threatened with destruction by a witch who has gained immortality. In a world where only you can repeat loops, loop the present and the past of 1,000 years ago, and challenge a powerful enemy. create your own unique deck and reach deepest part of the dragon labyrinth.

name: DungeonTomb
summary: "DungeonTomb" immerses players in dungeon exploration, shooting, and adventure. Delve into the mysterious underworld, confront endless mazes, and battle vicious monsters. In this perilous kingdom, face thrilling battles, explore ruins, and unlock powerful weapons. Challenge reflexes and strategy!

name: Duke Forces
summary: A long time ago, in a culture far, far away... games were games and Duke Nukem was a badass. Take Dark Forces, the 1995 Star Wars shooter, add Duke Nukem 3D, the 1996 classic shooter, enhance these two with awesome levels made by the community, force powers, light sabers, new art and sprite edits galore, plus some new gameplay mechanics, and you get Duke Forces.

name: Duke Nukem Xmas 2014
summary: This is a single-level Christmas themed map from Balls Of Steel team (it's true first release, too). It's set in a small town, in a snowy, rocky land; the mission is to clean it from aliens and get out of it.To give players a nice experience.

name: Dungeon Dev
summary: The demon lord, who has been secretly trading with the human kingdom's king, summons you and requests your help in developing a special dungeon. It's none other than a dungeon where is narrowly defeated by the heroes!

name: Duckthing's Rolling Rooms
summary: A room based puzzle-platformer with a weird duck.

name: Duel of games
summary: In the real world, the Game of the Year is about who is more fun to play,while in the gaming world,the Game of the Year is about who can fight better.In order to compete for the title of Game of the Year,games transform into fighters and engage in combat.Duel of classic game protagonists,pvp/pve/eve

name: Dumb Test: Check Your Teammates
summary: Before you invite a friend to the team, let him pass this game!

name: DudeGo
summary: Each map is different and has a challenge for you. Are you ready to conquer the unexpected? Prove that you can handle every challenge the game has to offer. Last survivor is the winner. will it be you?

name: Dumball Rush: Rainbow Pack
summary: The first DLC for Dumball Rush ! Including a lot of new cosmetics to sustain the project !

name: Dungeon Deck
summary: Explore a dungeon in the form of a deck of cards! Collect rare items, build your own deck, and defeat the dungeon!

name: Dubio
summary: Dubio is a game of tiny puzzle parcours. It offers a A challenging mix of puzzle-solving and momentum control. Jump and bounce through 100 levels that test your wits and sense of timing. Or are there more?

name: Dungeon of Astaroth
summary: In the ominous Devil's cave, a tenacious adventurer uncovers a foreboding destiny. Undeterred, our hero dives into a puzzle-filled dungeon where survival depends on wit, not weapons. This 2D platformer challenges players to navigate perilous puzzles and outsmart foes. No killing allowed.

name: Duplicate Dissolution
summary: Multiply your mind. Overcome a variety of trials using your trio of digital duplicates in this first-person puzzle game. Explore intricate, neon-lit rooms and unravel the mystery of the simulation and its enigmatic warden.

name: Duilius: The Ancient Duel
summary: With the Ancients aside , the Descendants of demons enter, one against another . Approach onto the battle between legionaries one at a time. DUILIUS a mini Side-Scroller RPG walks you through the Epic Lore of Possession for Legions.

name: Dungeon Ruins
summary: Dungeon Ruins is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a brave pioneer exploring mysterious dungeons full of treasures and dangers. You have to go through multi-story labyrinths filled with various enemies, riddles and treasures.

name: Dungeons and Ducklings
summary: Dungeons and Ducklings is a Retro - PacMan - Roguelite Adventure. Help Mama Duck rescue her ducklings from the evil Lich by navigating his dark dungeon. Use powerful attacks to create your own path through the Lich's maze.

name: Dungeon Divers
summary: Dungeon Divers is a dungeon-themed puzzle game about clearing derelict dungeons. As the newest employee of Dungeon Divers Inc., you must advance through multiple procedural generated levels, use your wits, and tools you acquire along the way to get to the core to defuse it and bring home the cash.

name: Dungeons of Alethrion
summary: Dungeons of Alethrion is a dungeon crawler roguelike game based on the Youtube animated series, Tales of Alethrion. Play as epic heroes from the show, each with unique abilities. Play it alone or grab a friend to join you in the dungeons!

name: Duckside
summary: Imagine DayZ or Rust but you're a duck. A persistent world survival game with PVP, PVE, crafting, base building and hat wearing ducks, wielding weapons.

name: Dusk Shrouded
summary: Sandbox game Free content updates

name: Duckified: Cosmic Legends
summary: Duckified: Cosmic Legends is meant to be a fast paced game all about the multiverse, with a whole lot of ducks!

name: Dungeon of Memories
summary: A world where a beast consume people's memories. With scant memories left, An 18-year-old fall into this Dungeon through coma, faces challenges to piece together his past, battling creatures, interact with unique NPCs, each memory reclaimed a victory in the hauntingly fascinating dungeon.

name: Dungeon Slime Hero
summary: Dungeon Slime Hero is a Roguelite Dungeon Crawler for semi-casual indie players! Explore the dungeon, level up, and acquire random loot to develop an overpowered build! DSH features click to move and attack controls with a unique combat system for customizing your Slime!

name: Dustino 64
summary: An indie 3D platformer inspired by Super Mario 64, go from nobody to a hero as Dustin, through vibrant hub worlds and stages to collect enough Gems to save Queen Merigold.

name: Dustopia
summary: You live in a world where your card game playing skills determine whether you survive another day. Build your deck, battle your opponents, create your own cards, solve puzzles, help people, and complete your main mission.

name: Dumb Ways to Dash!
summary: Dash through crazy and chaotic levels as you compete against others as your favourite Bean. Dumb Ways to Dash is a brand new crazy 3D race runner game from the world of Dumb Ways To Die.

name: Dungeon Chamber
summary: Dungeon Chamber is an action game, with an isometric view and character evolution. Three playable classes, MAGE, BARBARIAN and ROGUE(DLC). Acquire exclusive powers and adventure through 10 chambers for each hero. Unique ranking system for each chamber and hero.

name: Dungeon Chamber: Rogue
summary: Rogue class hero. Rogue has a crossbow, with freezing arrows, as his main weapon and the difficulty is moderate.

name: Dualikiwi
summary: Dualikiwi is a puzzle game in which your enemies mirror your movements. Your evil clones are stronger than you - use your environment to defeat them and emerge victorious!

name: Dumb Ways to Survive
summary: Collect, harvest and hunt your way through the wilderness as a bumbling bean trying to stay alive. Will you die a dummy or use your smarts to survive?

name: Duke Nukem Forever: Enhanced
summary:
Duke Nukem Forever: Enhanced is a mod for the 2011 release of DNF that aims to improve the gameplay of the original game and make it play more like a classic shooter, enhancements includes:
- Sprinting removed and faster player movement
- Jump height increased
- Swim speed is much faster
- Player can now hold breath underwater for 45 seconds instead of 15
- Weapon rebalance and screen shake when shooting removed
- 2/4 weapon limit completelly removed
- Quicksaves (F5 by default)
- Fixed "The Hive" chapter
- Depth of Field removed and new post processing effects
- Driving sections are now in first person perspective
- Enables shadows for all objects in the world

name: Dungeons of Dolkara
summary: Dungeons of Dolkara is a 'rogue-like meets souls-like' rpg game following a dwarf and his adventures. Fight for as long as your candle can light your way through the dark caverns under the mountain of Dolkara.

name: Ducking Grenades
summary: Ducking Grenades is a physics based game in which the protagonist traverses the world in a very unconventional way: With grenades! Hunt down the evil General Goosey and his minions and bring peace to the universe in this hand-made, fast-paced 2D side-scrolling action game!

name: Dust & Courage: Jake Bolton’s Journey
summary: "Dust & Courage: Jake Bolton's Journey" is a historical fantasy RPG set in the Wild West. Play as Jake, a cowboy uncovering secrets and exploring towns. Your choices shape Jake's destiny through quests and tough decisions. Experience compelling and fun stories for a memorable experience.

name: DunJaunt
summary: A focused dungeon running romp through the fantasy world of Relaryia! The land is sliding into chaos, and it's up to you with the help of a party of 4 elemental avatars to bring balance back to the world. Pick your favorites from Fire, Water, Storm, Earth, Light, and Darkness and cleanse the world!

name: Dungeon Sweeper
summary:
It's a puzzle or clicker game where you expand the world map while identifying dungeon locations, much like Minesweeper.
As your score increases, biomes multiply, making it livelier. It's a relaxing game, so give it a try!

name: Dungeon Princess 2
summary: Command a princess, and her subjects, as they head towards the deepest parts of a Dungeon. Rogue-like type real-time turn-based action RPG game.

name: Dune Dasher
summary: Endless Desert Destruction

name: Dungeon Sweeper KiKi
summary: The world was turned into a dungeon due to the overflow of trash thrown away by humans, and the trash evolved into monsters.

name: Duality
summary: Duality is a 5-level map Doom 2 mini wad - MBF21 format where every map is a dual-themed tech base.

name: Dust & Rain: Post-apocalyptic RPG
summary: Dust & Rain: Post-apocalyptic RPG is an immersive, story-driven top-down RPG - like Fallout. You will face hostile wasteland filled with combat challenges and moral choices. You will need to adapt and learn new skills to survive. Your actions shape devastated world. Who will you become?

name: Dungeon Riddle
summary: In this game, you find yourself in a dungeon where you need to look for keys and potions to move on. But there is one problem here - traps. They can be anywhere, and if you step on one of them, you'll have to start over.

name: Dust: Undefined
summary: Protect the core as long as you can from infinite undefined threats.

name: Dustland Delivery
summary: Dustland Delivery is a post-apocalyptic survival business simulator. Scour the wastes for profit, complete missions to grow your trading empire, and assemble a rag-tag band of adventurers to turn your city into the capital of the Dustlands. Danger lurks around every corner—but no risk, no reward!

name: Dungeon Delivery
summary:
Can you hear the urgent voices of warriors from the far away dungeons who are desperately in need of potions?
It's time for you to deliver potions to warriors in the dungeons, get close to the warriors, and make great money out of them!
Good luck!

name: Dummy Guyz
summary: Dummy Guyz is a multiplayer physics sandbox with no predefined rules. Get creative by building or breaking things your way. Warning: the game is bare-bones with no theme and minimal graphics, focusing solely on physics interactions.

name: DummyDoodle
summary: Developed, drawed and song created by one. Try to eliminate Final Bosses and complete levels.

name: Dull Acres
summary: You strayed from the path. Now you are doomed to wander the woods.

name: Duelite
summary: The Wild West dueling card roguelite. Duelite is an attractive card game where you must survive countless duels against all types of rivals in the Wild West. Will you be able to build a deck on par with the most wanted? Find out yourself!

name: Dunderbeck
summary: Grind magical creatures into sausages in the mystical world of Cincinnati, Ohio!

name: Dunes of Valor
summary: You will fight in an open field in the desert, switching to AI control depending on the situation.

name: Dungeon & Doggies
summary: Your human's missing & you're unleashed into a wild world! Explore the wilds, fight with cunning cardplay, and build the purrfect deck to conquer foes in this heartwarming adventure. Find your way home & prove you're more than just a pampered pet - you're a hero!

name: Dungeon Digger
summary: Dungeon Digger is a roguelike game about a brave dwarf seeking legendary treasures. Descend deep underground, mine valuable minerals, craft upgraded gear, and battle spiders, golems, worms, and ghosts to become a cave hero!

name: Dungeon World
summary: Dungeon World mixes roguelike and sandbox elements while keeping simple gameplay and retro style. Explore procedural worlds, plan your journey, make a family, modify the lands, get old and reincarnate with more world knowledge.

name: Dungeon Master
summary: In Dungeon Master, you either try to escape a randomly generated dungeon as a survivor or hunt down survivors as the Dungeon Master. It's a cross-platform game where your role determines your goal.

name: Dungeon of Fercho'po
summary: Jam Theme: Solitude - You are a lone treasure hunter exploring a once abandoned dungeon. You will face the perils that lurk inside without any party members or renewable supplies. Try your best to get the loot and then make it back out alive!

name: Duality
summary:
What started out as an attempt to flirt with a cute guy lands you in the middle of a bizarre love triangle. This could've been thrilling. That is, if you weren't being tugged back and forth between two people, between romance and terror, between bliss and insanity. Choose wisely, "Main Character", for your choices might determine who gets to live and who gets to die.

Duality is an erotic horror game about two unstable individuals trying to win you over through every romantic and gruesome way possible.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Computer Fantasy Game
summary: A simulator of the Dungeons & Dragons Computer Fantasy Game handheld.

name: Dungeon Full Dive: True Supporter Dice
summary: This special pack features uniquely designed digital dice, crafted exclusively for our most dedicated supporters. Ideal for collectors and enthusiasts looking to add a touch of exclusivity to their gameplay.

name: Duck Creator 2
summary: Duck Creator 2, Create your own Duck but better version!

name: Duskmire
summary: A thrilling 2D action rogue-lite platformer filled with countless spells and magical combinations. Craft your strategy by mixing powerful spells. Each playthrough offers a unique and challenging experience.

name: Dungeon of Erotic Master Plus
summary: This is a pseudo-3D dungeon/animation RPG. The girls hailed as the Erotic Masters after solving the mystery behind the world's toughest dungeon are now living legends. Explore the dungeons and acquire maps with these beautiful warriors and grow stronger. It's time to set off on a new adventure!

name: Dumbino
summary:
A physics sandbox with dominoes, explosions, and chain reactions at every corners.
The game proposes a solo compaign consisting of solving puzzles by tipping dominoes, and a level-editor designed to create and share you own levels to the community.

name: Duke Tournament
summary: It has one single-player episode "Annihilation" (of five levels) & a dukematch episode of eight levels.

name: Duke 3:16
summary: Duke is off relaxing in a secret location. The aliens have infiltrated EDF headquarters and taken key leadership hostage. The ransom is the location of Duke.The aliens are methodically cutting off all escape routes. The only way left out is through the tunnel at the railstation.

name: Duke 6:8
summary: Duke 6:8 picks up where Duke 23:4 left. Duke must find his way through a dam in order to exact vengeance on his treacherous EDF buddies.

name: Duke 12:12
summary: Duke is back in town after having cleared a nearby dam of alien scum in Duke 6:8.

name: Duke Craft
summary:
Duke Craft is a combination of DN3D mechanics and Minecraft-like level design. The story is simple - aliens stole Duke's hard earned diamonds and he has to get them back.

The map includes some features taken from Minecraft, like crafting or using of torches to light the areas.

name: Duketroid
summary: A conceptual Duke map which replicates the fundamental game design concept behind Super Metroid, Castlevania: Symphony of the Night and many others in that genre.

name: Duke 2070
summary: Made for the 9th annual map contest of Duke España. It's a very large city from the author of the Doom II Planisphere (extremely large city) levels.

name: Duke Mansion
summary: Haunted Mansion community CBP map in the spirit of Halloween.

name: Duck Hunt JS
summary: Duck Hunt JS is an online browser game based on the NES game Duck Hunt. It is a recreation of the original game.

name: Dungeon Tiny Hunter
summary: In "Dungeon and Little Monster Hunters", you can create your own dungeon adventure, travel through a dungeon kingdom full of demons, constantly overcome obstacles and eliminate monsters, and invite partners from the monster hunting camp to join you. The whole game is a rich action-mowing 2D game.

name: Dungeon Jinrou
summary: Can you survive this dungeon...! A new dungeon exploration werewolf game is here! ! 20 people can play against each other and over 60 types of roles!

name: Dungeons 4: The Good, the Bad and the Evil
summary: Dungeons 4 – The Good, the Bad and the Evil awaits the Absolute Evil and his more or less dedicated General Thalya with (train)wagon loads of evil work to do. Led by their fearless queen, Brynnhild, those pesky dwarves have infiltrated a new part of the Overworld, the West, and kidnapped the Council of Little Snots. In this latest adventure, the Only-too-familiar-with-hardships Evil has to face new enemies equipped with pistols, sniper rifles and rotary guns, and … a beer-brewing beast of a dwarf. But of course, the Cunning Evil is prepared and leaves you well-equipped with new traps and building options to protect your stony dungeon heart!

name: Dubscr's Murder Mystery
summary: Multiplayer Social Deduction Murder Mystery Game! Want a game that you can play with your buddies and have a good time? This is the game for you. Mines, smoke grenades, tasers, custom maps, player customization, and more.

name: Due to Rain
summary:
Oh, no! ️
Due to rain, Ribbon and Sarah missed out of their daily walk.
Though, they may have found another way to stay active inside.

name: Dungeon Beach
summary: Cute and sexy seaside random dungeon action

name: Duck Run
summary: Duck Run is an exhilarating 2D precision platformer that will test your reflexes and agility.

name: Dungeon Diver
summary: An arcade-like maze crawler full of treasures and traps!

name: Dungeon Mercenaries
summary: Dungeon Mercenaries is an endless replayability RPG. Every time you wake up, it's a new start, procedurally generated map, randomly generated characters,explore the dungeon with different mercenaries, get reasure chests, gold coins, mercenaries, potions, food, and glory!

name: Dual Eclipse
summary: Restore order to the cosmos by seeking out a Prismatic Dragon imprisoned in the stars. Delve into dungeons, evade traps, and discover secrets. Seek adventure as one of three classes in this trick-taking RPG.

name: Duck Adventures
summary: Duck Adventures features 30 levels of exciting gameplay. A game that will not leave you indifferent to the fate of the duck. Who returns home after a long fishing trip.

name: Dungeons & Furries
summary: ✨What's more alluring than the charm of fantasy worlds? Answer: the same, but with sex. The more sex and magic, the better. Choose your character’s gender, solve match-three puzzles, enjoy the fully voiced animations, and find out how your story ends!✨

name: Duskfade
summary: Duskfade is a colorful adventure in a world where the torments of the past haunt you. Battle against your memories in a dizzying dance to fade the shadows of the dusk.

name: Dungeum
summary: Embark on an endless turn-based adventure in Dungeum, a strategic dungeon crawler where every decision shapes your journey through treacherous depths.

name: Duelant
summary: Blood, money and courage merge in different eras. It's time to determine the strongest fighter in this virtual world. Exciting battles await you in a variety of environments where your skill and chutzpah will play a decisive role.

name: Duriano
summary: Duriano is a top-down arena shooting Slasher roguelike game where the player will be a hero durian of the norse wielding a weapon to fight upon a god of norse mythology. From different weapons, Durian hero, God’s trail, items will lead the player to create a build and defeat all gods of asgard.

name: Dungeon Done
summary: Dungeon Done is a PvE co-op horror survival extraction game where players explore dungeons previously cleared by heroes. The objective is for up to six players to team up, gathering hidden treasures and evading lurking dangers to make their daring escape.

name: DuaLight
summary: In this challenging cyberpunk platformer switch between day and night environments, go through dangerous obstacles by manipulating gravity and time. Upgrade your abilities to conquer these levels with an intense soundtrack. Are you ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush?

name: Dungeon Board
summary: Dungeon Board is a virtual tabletop and companion app that puts you in control. Author your encounters and play them out with friends over Steam Remote Play Together or video sharing.

name: Dungeon Madness
summary:
A wizard has hidden in these dungeons. He is plotting to conquer the world and the only way how to stop him is to kill him! But don't think it will be easy, many before have tried without luck. (From what else would all those skeletons be made of? Polycarbonate?)

Explore gigantic dungeon to find new epic items, new equipment, learn powerful spells and fight all kinds of different monsters. Are you afraid of dark? Don't worry, because a ghost residing in doors will become your best friend. Or not. Who knows?

name: Dungeons & Kingdoms
summary: A medieval fantasy kingdom builder, management sim and dungeon delver RPG hybrid. Gather resources, hunt wild animals and build infrastructure. Then dive into the dungeons to face the monsters within. Reap the rewards, unlock new resources and advance your tech.

name: Ducky: The Brave
summary: The journey of a pet duck 'Ducky'! Healing(Hard) game going up the river towards the top of the mountain.

name: Ducks
summary: Enter the universe of NFDs (Non-Fungible Ducks)! Click the duck and earn more ducks. Collect as many limited edition and rare ducks as you can!

name: Ducks
summary: Ducks is a cute clicker game focused on growing your ever expanding collection of little ducks.

name: Dungeons of Dreadrock 2: The Dead King´s Secret
summary: Dungeons of Dreadrock - The Dead King's Secret is Part 2 of the (yet unfinished) Dreadrock Trilogy. In this episode you'll puzzle and fight your way through the ancient cavern parts of Dreadrock Mountain. The game features 100 levels, 5 bosses, two different endings and tons of adorable pixel art.

name: Dust
summary: A Western by IkeC

name: Dusk City
summary: A flourishing civilization had sunk into the sea. The night never dawns...... and a sense of apocalypse hangs over the world. You'll land on an island in such a world, and as you explore the town and ruins, you'll come into contact with fragments of the world's mysteries.

name: Dustborn: The Vision Tour Bundle
summary:
Get your hands on the Vision Tour Bundle to unlock the following digital content:
- Sherbet twirl hat
- EYE C U jacket
- Psycho Pete bat

name: Dungeon Gals
summary: A small polycule-turned-crisis control team been summoned to help a civilization in the sky escape impending doom! Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and find lots of treasure to help prepare yourself for incredible challenges!

name: Duskfall
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey with this turn-based dungeon crawler RPG! Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Duskfall. Dive into the heart of dungeons, where every step holds secrets, treasures, and formidable foes.

name: Dunk Trickster
summary:
Let's play a game. A real game. On the real streets. The rule is simple - score.

You can't even imagine where streeball can be played. Discover all the locations for your best shot. Want to play at the airport? This is easy! Jump on the planes like it's your playground. Or do you want to break through the glass before the dunk? You can do it here!

name: Duty First
summary: Metal beats life. Life beats death. Metal beats death.

name: Dungeon Faster
summary: DUNGEON FASTER, an original hybrid of dungeon crawler, turn-based strategy, and card game. It's the roguelike from hell!

name: Duck Side of the Moon
summary: Waddle and fly as a duck in space! Explore every corner of the galaxy and find curious creatures and materials along the way. Craft gadgets, upgrade your spaceship, and get cozy in this relaxing adventure.

name: Dungeon Antiqua
summary: Dungeon Antiqua is a simple RPG inspired by the Wizardry and Final Fantasy games of the 1980s and 1990s, in which players traverse dungeons by repeatedly exploring and developing their characters.

name: DuneCrawl
summary: DuneCrawl is an online coop action-adventure game where players take on the roles of desert faring privateers. Together, players explore the dust seas by piloting their Dune Crawler, a gigantic walking crustacean festooned with cannons and treasure maps.

name: Duelyst Origins
summary: Duelyst Origins is a mix between a card game & board game. Play units, sling spells and equip artifacts to control the battlefield. Choose a faction and build custom decks, all cards are free!

name: Dungeon Watchers
summary: Survive and destroy monsters to your heart's content with the help of powerful and unique characters. Unlock new characters and discover the synergies with their abilities to unleash game-breaking builds and slay everything on your path.

name: Dungeons 4: Nintendo Switch Edition
summary:
Follow the Evil Way and foster the return of the Absolute Evil!
Having to deal with a newborn, dwarves, and her obnoxious stepbrother, wasn’t quite what Thalya had hoped for.

name: Dust & Diesel: Deadland Delivery
summary: Dust & Diesel: Deadland Delivery is an immersive post-apocalyptic trucking simulation game where players navigate the dangerous and desolate landscapes of the Deadlands.

name: Dungeon Gore: Lost Treasury
summary: Dungeon Gore is a FPS, strategy, and stealth horror game where you explore the dungeon and collect enough ancient treasure and escape with your findings.

name: Dunebound Tactics
summary: Lead your band of survivors on a perilous trek across unforgiving sands in search of a new home. Battle ruthless factions, scavenge dwindling resources, reshape the terrain to your advantage and make life-or-death choices in Dunebound Tactics, a Roguelite Turn-Based Tactical RPG.

name: Duake
summary:
Gaming enthusiast and developer Magic Nipples has released Duake (Doom in Quake). It's a Quake mod featuring the main character (Doomguy) and the original Doom weapons.

"Run through the Quake campaign as Doomguy. It's that easy!" the project's creator explained in the description of the Duake mod.

In addition to the Doom Slayer, the first version of Quake in the Duake mod featured a full arsenal of weapons from Doom, as well as an original interface in two versions (classic and compact from Doom 64).

The mod's source code is published on GitHub. The mod's developer has promised to make further improvements to the project.

name: Dual Discovery: Unite Challenge
summary: Unlike traditional hidden object games, "Dual Discovery: Unite Challenge" offers you an entirely new treasure-hunting experience! Each mission item is cleverly split into two parts, scattered throughout the picture.

name: Dusttale: The Murderous Comedy
summary:
A complete reimagining of dusttale. New bosses, new areas, many different endings and 3 routes.

The main difference from other dusttale takes, is that here your choices really matter, and even just killing everyone can be done in different ways. As well as giving up killing and getting a good ending. Also remember, Sans is not the main character in this comedy!

name: DuckLaserDuck
summary: DLD offers synergies unfettered by balance. Chain lightning proc'ing explosions for exponential chaos. Your brain won't be able to handle the copious amount of Juice. If things get too crazy, it's your fault! :D

name: Dungeon Flowy
summary: An auto-battle hack-and-slash RPG. Assemble a party of six and combine your favorite jobs to aim for the deepest part of the dungeon. Enhance your stats with passive equipment obtained from treasure chests or alter the probability of skill usage. Create your own unique build!

name: Ducky Dash
summary: Ducky Dash is a tribute to classic handheld games, featuring a charming green monochromatic palette and a retro soundtrack that evokes nostalgia. Embark on an exciting journey with a fearless little duck, using your Dash skills to overcome obstacles and explore vibrant worlds.

name: Duolingo
summary:
Duolingo is a gamified language learning app, which works using the spaced repetition technique. In order to keep the learner engaged, Duolingo has leaderboards, daily objectives and rewards like badges, items, its own currency and experience points.

As September 24th, 2024, Duolingo added a new lesson type called "Adventures", in which you can control one of Duolingo's mascots, while answering questions to make the scene play out.
As of April 2025, Duolingo has added a Chess course for iOS.

name: Dungeon Vending Machines
summary: Dungeon Vending Machines is a relaxing, casual idle game. Where you run vending machines in a dungeon! As adventurers brave dangerous depths, you’ll be their lifeline. Expand your machine lineup, grow your profits, and become the ultimate dungeon supplier!

name: D.U.M.B. Ducks
summary: D.U.M.B. Ducks is an action-filled, retro platform game. Slaughter giant snails. Battle gigantic beasts. Buy better guns. Blow up walls. Collect fat stacks of cash.

name: Dustbunny: Emotions to Plants
summary: Dustbunny is a warm, relaxing yet guided journey of reconnecting with your repressed emotions, where the emotions are cute creatures that like to hide. If you catch one and let it express itself, it can grow into a beautiful plant - some into extremely rare plants! Care for your plants with fun interactions like watering, catching pests and so much more - you can even sing for your plant. Relax with minigames like catching bubbles in your bubble tea. As your room becomes your safe space, you might encounter your inner child in the room's hidden depths.

name: Dungeon of Grandmasters
summary: You've embarked on an adventure in a cave. Take out all the monsters that will try to defeat you and survive until the end. Dungeon of Grandmasters is a roguelite game that allows you thousands of combinations to defeat the enemies that appear, allowing you to play alone or with friends.

name: Dungeon Crystal
summary: Travel the seas, corrupted by evil crystals. Transform into different spirits and animals to solve puzzles. Find hidden treasures and become stronger to defeat the wild monsters. Save the islands by destroying the beautiful but destructive crystals. And take a break while catching some fish on your own sailing ship.

name: Dust and Echoes
summary:
Dust and Echoes is a semi-open world fps that takes place in Oregon after doomsday. The game has 3 missions that can be completed in any order. After completing all 3, a new location will open on the map for the ending.

You can engage with NPCS and merchants to buy better gear and replenish health and ammo. Killing raiders will also allow you to sell their fingers for currency. "Dire coin" is the crypto currency of this world.

Underneath lies a story about accepting your face and learning to deal with the issues that surround you. Your life is what you make of it.

name: Dungeons 3: Extremely Evil Edition
summary: Dungeons III Extremely Evil Edition Includes: Dungeons III, a unique Throne Room DLC, an original Dungeons Coaster and the Digital Soundtrack!

name: Dungeon Rummage: Survival
summary:
Dungeon Rummage - Survival is a bite-sized, Survival-lite, Turn-based Dungeon crawler with a cozy vibe.

Stranded on a remote island, your only path to escape leads through a dangerous underground dungeon. Dungeon Rummage - Survival is a turn-based dungeon crawler where you gather resources and upgrade your camp to survive.

Explore the depths to collect essential materials. Bring your finds back to camp to enhance your stats, craft potions, and cook meals, all of which are crucial for facing tougher enemies.

Your ultimate goal is to reach the dungeon’s bottom and find your way back home.

name: Dungeon Keep
summary: The Princess has been kidnapped by the evil Necromancer Merlock and taken to Dungeon Keep! Now King Medias has tasked you, the most skilled warrior of the land,to rescue the Princess and defeat Merlock the Necromancer!

name: Duckweed
summary: Eat the Duckweed!

name: Dungeon Keeper: Labyrinth Legacy
summary: Dungeon Keeper: Labyrinth Legacy is a dynamic tower defense. Develop your dungeon and create monsters to guard your territory against adventurers.

name: Dungeons 4: Not Another Multiverse
summary: Tristan and Thalya are thrown into yet another multiverse and Thalya makes an astounding discovery: The demonic and hordic inhabitants hate them BOTH. There is only one way out of this – and it’s by joining the forces of Evil and Good to find a way back into your own world.

name: Duck Eggs
summary: Welcome to Duck Eggs, an innovative game that mixes desktop pet, collection, trading, clicking and surprise elements together. In this world, you'll collect all kinds of rare and fantastic duck eggs . Eventually, you can exchange them for money to help the duck go back to her original world.

name: Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping
summary: When spookiness strikes a luxury campsite, the one and only Duck Detective is summoned to quack the case. Inspect evidence, make de-duck-tions, and solve this no-murder mystery!

name: Dungeonfell
summary:
Enter the World of Dungeonfell,

A tactical team-based Roguelite where you lead a group of heroes into ever-changing dungeons. Battle against hordes of Monsters and uncover the corruption lurking deep within the dungeon’s heart.

Learn the unique abilities of each Hero and unlock new spells and skills as you progress. Combine your heroes strategically to create powerful synergies and overcome the increasingly difficult enemies you face.

name: Dumb Ways Free For All
summary: A new dumb adventure awaits with Dumb Ways: Free For All! Available on the Quest 2, Quest 3 and 3s, play solo or bring up to FIVE other players along to experience the dumb mayhem together. Embark on a ‘mostly-safe’ vacation where each destination brings wild activities and unexpected surprises - all in the form of crazy, fun-filled minigames!

name: Dustbowl Brulo
summary: Explosive desert shootout

name: Dungeon Odyssey
summary:
Aaron Hall's Dungeon Odyssey is an RPG where you will adventure to far off lands and encounter a multitude of different creatures.

But once you complete the game, the fun is not over. Dungeon Odyssey creates a random world for you each time you play. So no two games are ever the same. And to add to the fun, the game is completely customizable (moddable) so that players can create their own modules for others to play.

You will become a character within the game and will play the role of that character as you venture through the world. You will have one main quest to complete in the module, and many other smaller quests to complete if you wish. As you decide on a style of playing, you can shape your character towards that style with different items, skills, and spells.

name: Due
summary:
Due is a short first person horror, climbing / walking simulator.

In the far future, take control of someone tasked with appeasing the Gods to regain their tribe's life source - water.

Made for the 48 hour Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend Jam.

A spiritual predecessor to Kill the KOTH

name: Dungeon Raze
summary: Here’s a fast-paced dungeon destruction shooter you can clear in as little as 30 minutes! Break walls for shortcuts, detours, or direct paths. Double ammo, halve reload time, and power up to smash through even the toughest walls!

name: Duo
summary:
No-nonsense old-school 2D blasting action with original gameplay twists and surprises and enough challenges for even the most battle-hardened of players.

DUO - twice the firepower.
DUO - twice the destruction.
DUO - twice the fun.

name: DuckWorld Smart Adventures
summary:
DuckWorld Smart Adventures is an online Dutch educational adventure game and is a digital spinoff of the Donald Duck comics world full of exciting, funny and enlightening games with Donald Duck and other familiar Duckburg characters.

With over twenty 3D mini-games, Donald Duck Weekly ensures that your child, as a true citizen of Duckburg, can play in a safe, responsible and rich game environment.

name: DuckWorld Revive
summary:
DuckWorld Revive is an online world full of exciting, funny and enlightening games with Donald Duck and other familiar Duckburg characters.

With over twenty 3D mini-games, Donald Duck Weekly ensures that your child, as a true citizen of Duckburg, can play in a safe, responsible and rich game environment.

name: Duck Game
summary: Join the ducks on their cute journey for world domination.

name: Ducks
summary: Enter the universe of NFDs (Non-Fungible Ducks)! Click the duck and earn more ducks. Collect as many limited edition and rare ducks as you can!

name: Dual Cat: Max
summary: Join Max, the brave and clever cat, on a puzzle-platformer adventure to save his best friend, Erwin

name: Dusttale Reimagined
summary:
Ever wanted an Undertale fangame that completely re-builds (or rather, REIMAGINES) the concept of Dusttale from the ground up?
Well you're in luck! This game is just for you!
Explore the Underground, meet old friends in new situations and join us in this race for DETERMINATION against Flowey your best friend in Dusttale Reimagined!

name: Dusttrust X
summary: From the developers behind the fangame Green Snas, Dusttrust X is a revitalization of the original Dusttrust AU as well as a spiritual successor to Legacy Underswap: Thanatos. You play as both Chara and Sans as you explore a broken version of the world you once knew and see how they both react to the new situation they put themselves in of their own doing.

name: Dustswap: Dusttrust
summary:
You pushed the limits of this world one too many times.

And now you must deal with the consequences of your actions.

name: Ducky Clicker
summary: Discover the universe of Ducky Clicker, an idle game full of unique rubber ducks. Click, expand your collection, and unlock divine powers, quantum ducks, and more. Rule the world of ducks as you ascend to infinity!

name: Dumbot
summary: Dumbot is a retro style hyper casual scrolling platformer game. Fluid and challenging gameplay designed to entertain. Amazing graphics, easy controls and two big worlds to explore providing you with many hours of fun playing time. Also no annoying in app purchases.

name: Duck Duck Shoot
summary:
Step into a beautifully crafted world where colorful rubber ducks bob and weave across a shimmering water track, each one waiting to test your sharpshooting skills. From classic yellow ducks to rare golden specimens and tricky color-changing variants, every target brings its own challenge and rewards.

The game captures the authentic feel of vintage carnival attractions with its warm, glowing lights, hand-painted wooden booth designs, and cheerful carnival music that'll transport you straight back to those summer fairground memories.

name: Dungeon Online
summary: A Dungeon Crawler that you can play alone or with your friends in online co-op. There's also Arena Mode where you can fight against other players in online pvp.

name: Duck Duck Adventure
summary: Duck Duck Adventure is a 2D top-down roguelike with deck-building mechanics. Play as a duck disguised as various characters to defend a village from invading monsters and bosses. Trade for equipment, craft unique card builds, grow stronger, and survive waves of enemies to claim victory.

name: Dukkido
summary: Recruit an army of minions and overwhelm the enemy! Dukkido is a physics-based Action-RTS, featuring large handcrafted levels and dungeons. You've been Zorped in from your edge of reality, and command your Dogs of War to riches, glory, and a good meal. Supports up to 5-player online co-op.

name: Duck Shoot
summary: This game allows you to play the part of an early morning duck hunter. When the sun comes up all the ducks will fly away, so you have to shoot the sun back down when it rises.

name: Dungeon Warfare III
summary: Forge invincible defenses with lethal traps and devious machines, and crush relentless waves of adventurers in the ultimate tower defense showdown!

name: Dungeonfield
summary: Plunked into a 2D, side-scrolling world randomly generated and populated with dangerous dungeons, and you'll need to smash, stab, dig, and otherwise destroy your environment to gather the supplies you'll need to craft and survive day-to-day. Turns out in a great battle, the kingdom was destroyed and all its people carted off to dungeons, and only you can save them.

name: Dungeon And Darkness
summary: Create your own avatar and live as an adventurer in the town of "Elbern," surrounded by dungeons. Delve into the dungeons and collect weapons and equipment with random effects. The goal is to conquer the final dungeon, the "Great Hole of Elbern."

name: Dungeons & Drivers
summary: Experience a Bullet Heaven rogue-lite on wheels: gear up, battle relentless foes in an action-packed adventure!

name: Dungeon Train
summary: You're a security guard for hire set to work on a train when it is hijacked at night! Take guns and shoot your way through each car until the train is fully liberated.

name: Dustbound
summary: Build your deck, craft overpowered cards, and command up to five customizable drones. Adapt, strategize, and fight your way through the unforgiving desert.

name: Dungeon of the Devourer
summary: Dungeon of the Devourer is a turn-based RPG where you play an orc on a quest to save her village from The Ravenous Hunger. Explore the dungeon while using expansion based abilities and statuses to fight baddies and solve puzzles.

name: Dust Devil
summary: In the middle of street riots, you dodge motor officers, lasers, orbital beams and break cell mufflers on your hyper bike. The game is super fast and difficult: it has time limit and just a few checkpoints on your way to boss fights. With just one mouse button you control a swarm of bikers or a single agile rider. Your skills and tactics are that matters on each level.

name: Dungeon Keeper Premium
summary:
Dungeon Keeper Premium (ダンジョンキーパープレミアム) is a Japanese release and repackaging of Dungeon Keeper. It features both Japanese and English voice and text, and includes The Deeper Dungeons, the Desktop Theme, and the Direct3D version. It does not, however, include the Dungeon Keeper Level Editor. There is also no MS-DOS version; it is Windows-only, unlike western releases.

The package also includes the story booklet The Dreadful Demise of Derek the Dauntless. At least some versions also feature an Electronic Arts loading cinematic, which does not exist on the western versions of Dungeon Keeper. There is also a creature 'investigative report' booklet, which shows each creature's stats and is not in western releases of Dungeon Keeper, although the information is in the English official guide book. Later releases also include trailers for other Electronic Arts games, including Dungeon Keeper 2; this is the later trailer.

While at first glance, Dungeon Keeper Premium may seem to simply be the Japanese name for Dungeon Keeper Gold, the numerous differences are strongly suggestive of it being a separate release.

name: Dug Out
summary: "Dug Out" is an exciting multiplayer PvP game for 2-4 players, where you dive into an underground arena and engage in intense battles. Armed with guns, you'll dig through the environment to uncover hidden opponents and outsmart your rivals.

name: Duo Quest
summary: Dive into a fantasy world where your bond is your greatest weapon! Team up with a friend to battle monsters by answering quirky and thought-provoking questions about each other, while building decks and exploring an ever-changing world. Can your relationship survive the ultimate test?

name: Dungeon Ascent
summary: Descend into the dark depths of a dungeon teeming with creepy creatures, where every moment is a fight for survival. Grab powerful weapons, improve your skills and fight to your last breath to survive as long as possible in this endless nightmare.

name: Duke Nukem Forever Collection
summary:
Items included in this package:
- Duke Nukem Forever
- Duke Nukem Forever: Hail to the Icons Parody Pack
- Duke Nukem Forever: The Doctor Who Cloned Me

name: Dungeon Thrones: Rise of Slimes
summary: Conquer the dungeons as a Slime who has mastered hundreds of weapons, items, a massive passive skill tree, elemental abilities, turrets, area attacks, and even minions. There are no limits to the builds you can create!

name: Dune: Imperium - Rise of Ix
summary: The award-winning first expansion to Dune: Imperium keeps the spice flowing like never before!

name: Dude Fighter
summary: "Dude Fighter" is an exciting side-scrolling 2D arcade game where you play as a boy who finds himself in a world populated by terrifying flying monsters. Your task is to survive and emerge victorious!

name: Duelist's Gambit
summary: Play the role and daily life of a wandering duelist hired to protect a nobleman embroiled in a dangerous affair. Navigate both deadly duels and delicate social situations in this gripping visual novel/RPG with realistic swordplay inspired by period fencing manuals.

name: Duck N Roll
summary: Don't hesitate. Roll the dice! Duck N Roll is a dice-rolling roguelike game where you go on an adventure with the wizard duck and its friends. Roll the dice, use powerful skills and win against monsters!

name: Dungeon Mori
summary: Dungeon Mori is a game inspired by the classic Dungeon Crawlers and Old School RPGs. With a simple, yet addicting gameplay, it features a turn based battle system combined with a choice based dungeon exploration.

name: Duel Hell Purgatory
summary: One weapon. One character. One hit - one kill. Equal conditions for everyone. At any time. Find and eliminate your enemy without getting hit in a tactical and atmospherically dense PVP experience with a slow pace. The only thing that makes the difference in DHP is you.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Keep on the Borderlands
summary: Help the commonfolk trapped within the Keep on the Borderlands in their struggle against the Cult of Evil Chaos. A collection of 8 quest dungeons adapted from the classic D&D module for new characters & early epic levels. The Borderlands is also a large adventure area where players can hunt monsters and obtain horses.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Seal of Shan-to-Kor
summary: A premium three-part dungeon for low level characters. Search the sewers for a large hobgoblin town and take back the Seal of Shan-To-Kor before its power is turned against Stormreach.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Sharn Syndicate
summary: A small series of very short premium dungeons for low level characters. Protect the marketplace from a gang that extorts innocent business owners.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Archetype - Wild Mage
summary: An add-on that has to be purchased in the store. You can make a new character that plays as a variant of the sorcerer class. Wild Mages tap into chaos and luck when they cast their spells.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Race - Warforged
summary: An add-on that has to be purchased in the store. Warforged are a race of sentient constructs built to battle in the Last War. The Warforged body is covered by plating, but prevents wearing any other armor. They can be healed with repair magic, which makes them ideal for playing as or partying with arcane spellcasters.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Race - Tabaxi
summary: Tabaxi are cat-like humanoid creatures with supernatural powers. Light on their feet, the fearsome Tabaxi favor dexterity and agility as they hunt, leap, and claw their way through many dangers.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Delera's Tomb
summary: A premium collection of short dungeons about ghostly skeletons and other undead. The main quests are narrated by Gary Gygax.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Lost Gatekeepers
summary: A small series of short premium dungeons for low level characters. The Gatekeepers have established a new grove outside Stormreach and some of the recently recruited initiates have gone missing. Follow the clues to help rescue these would-be guardians of Eberron.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Devil Assault
summary: The Chronoscope premium raid and a dungeon that supports multiple character levels. Travel back in time to find out what happened when a vortex of invading devils destroyed the Stormreach Marketplace.

name: Dumpling Together
summary: Dumpling Together is a very easy click casual game.You can complete the level all the way with just a few clicks of the mouse.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Shadow Under Thunderholme
summary: Explore the dwarven city of Thunderholme and defeat powerful dragons and their allies. This is a premium quest collection with two raids, a large adventure area for hunting monsters and the ability to craft thunder-forged weapons. Part of D&D's 40th anniversary "Tyranny of Dragons" event across multiple products.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Vault of Night
summary: A premium six-part quest series, culminating in an epic raid battle against a red dragon. The story revolves around recruiting the lost Laughing Knives companions to help infiltrate a heavily fortified vault. This was the first raid added to Dungeons & Dragons Online.

name: Ducky Runners
summary: Ducky Runnerz is a fast-paced 2D precision platformer where you play as a determined mother duckling rescuing her stolen eggs from the malicious raccoon gang!

name: Dueholo
summary: Rogue-like card RPG where you build your deck with cards of hololive members! Fight against holomem to strengthen your deck and defeat boss holomem!

name: Dungeon CEO
summary: Take on the role of a Victorian-era Dungeon CEO. Manage resources, recruit monsters, and customize your deck to dominate turn-based fights. Outwit your opponents, acquire coins, and lead the Dungeon Company to victory in a world teeming with adventures and gods.

name: Dungeon Mana
summary: In this turn-based roguelite, each run is unique: characters are randomly generated with different abilities. Combat revolves around three colors of mana: red, blue, and green, creating dynamic strategies. Overcome battles and face the final boss. Master the mana!

name: Dungeon of Love: Catch Monsters
summary: Capture monsters, discover their human form, and fall in love with a unique cast of girls while exploring dangerous dungeons. Love has never been this adventurous!

name: Dust II: The Infinite Zero Point
summary: Welcome to DUST. Set in 2025, you and your crew must locate the Zero Point. If you're daring enough, venture alone and face the consequences of your choice. The path is yours, choose your fate.

name: Dusty
summary: Dusty is a third-person puzzle game focused on explore beautiful environments. Join archaeologist Dusty on his search for a mysterious civilization. Explore equipped with your extensible cane and notebook to resolve the past, the ways of the civilization and his technology of light.

name: Dusty
summary: Dusty is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter where strategy and skill determine victory. Join intense battles in Capture the Flag, Team Deathmatch, and Free for All, with more modes coming soon. Choose your team, fight for dominance, and experience adrenaline-fueled combat!

name: Dusty Secrets
summary: Investigate Mysteries in a Detective game where AI creates everything and suspects, clues change with every case.

name: Dusty Dunes Tycoon
summary: Welcome to Dusty Dunes Tycoon! A VR Gemstone Tycoon game. Unlock and upgrade unique Droppers and explore different areas each with unique attractions. Grab a pickaxe and hit the mines, grab a brush and polish some geodes, or strap up and hit the range, there's much to experience!

name: Dusty's Sweeping Cleanup
summary: Clean your way around the house as a robot vacuum with this action and racing inspired experience!

name: Dungemon
summary: Raise and battle your very own Dungemon virtual pets! Battle your pets against wild Dungemon to make them even stronger! Train your creatures and increase their level enough to get them to evolve into stronger versions of themselves. Train and battle 90 different pets.

name: Dumbolf
summary: Help this golf-loving elephant complete 18 holes in as few strokes as possible.

name: Dungeon Solitaire
summary:
Dungeon Solitaire is an original fantasy card game. Monsters are flooding up through the Castle Wolfcairn's tunnels after a prison break went bad.

Players must carefully place heroes, monsters, items, treasures, and trap cards into the dungeon chambers. When a hero and monster face each other, a battle ensues and the strongest will survive. Players win the game by filling up the castle dungeon with heroes, and lose the game if the dungeons are filled by monsters, who will slowly start to destroy the castle.

name: Dungeon Defenders Ultimate Collection
summary: “Dungeon Defenders Ultimate Collection” combines action-packed tower defense mechanics with RPG elements, allowing players to take on the role of heroes defending their realm from invading forces. Players can choose from various character classes, each with unique abilities, and strategically place defenses to thwart waves of enemies. The game features a rich fantasy world filled with vibrant environments, cooperative multiplayer modes, and a deep progression system that enhances character customization. With its engaging blend of strategy and action, players are immersed in a captivating battle against the forces of darkness.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Vaults of the Artificers
summary: From fiery crystal mines and kobold-infested islands to fantastic extra-planar vaults, House Cannith needs you for missions of acquisition and conquest. This is a premium collection of dungeons with 12 timed challenges. They support all character levels and play more like very long minigames that reward teamwork.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Temple of Elemental Evil
summary: An enormous premium dungeon narrated by Wil Wheaton. Adapted from the classic Dungeons & Dragons pen-and-paper module.

name: Dungeon Overdose
summary: “Dungeon Overdose” is a roguelike command battle RPG combining dungeon exploration with overindulgence. Players manage “lives” while navigating a 100-floor procedurally generated dungeon, using random companions, events, and cards.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Attack on Stormreach
summary: A premium set of 4 quest dungeons. Droaam, the kingdom of monsters, is attacking Stormreach. These adventures bring players over, under and around Stormreach, eventually leading to an ancient giant's ruin where monstrous deeds are underway.

name: Dungeon Slide
summary: "DUNGEON SLIDE" is a puzzle game where you move the protagonist in four directions to collect gems and escape the dungeon.

name: Dust Bunny
summary: In Dust Bunny, you are a little bunny with a big job - sweep up the dust!

name: Due Last Week
summary: Due Last Week is a short indie horror experience where you play as Miles Kent, a struggling construction worker who lives in a town called Wickerford, barely scraping by. With no money for streaming services, you find comfort in renting cheap VHS tapes from Reel Time Rentals, a run-down but familiar store you visit often.

name: Duet
summary: DUET illustrates the Hifuu Club's first encounter. It is a wordless, narrative-driven experience about connection and small moments in life. Step into the subtle yet fateful daily interactions that intertwine Renko and Merry's lives.

name: DuoQ
summary: Squad up with Tala, a mysterious (and flirty!) player you meet in the lobby of a fictional FPS game. Use your real-life voice to talk with Tala over comms, solve puzzles, and outwit enemies. By the end, you’ll answer the most important question: Is she into you?

name: Dungeon of Love: Catch Monsters to Make a Perfect Anime Girlfriend
Dungeon of Love: Catch Monsters to Make a Perfect Anime Boyfriend
summary: Explore dungeons, capture monsters, and win hearts in a dangerous yet sweet adventure… where the real danger is falling in love.

name: Dubstep Sound Pack
summary: A 5-note sound pack featuring filthy synths, nasty bass and delinquent drums. 5 Beat School lessons and trophies also included.

name: Dusky Cap
summary: Dusky Cap is a 2D hack-and-slash game.

name: Dungeons and Taverns
summary:
This datapacks ported as mod adds vanilla like structures that are supposed to blend in with the rest of the game and feel like they belong there. Going from environmental additions like fire watch towers and taverns to dungeons like Badlands Miner Outpost and Illager hideout. But it also overhauls some of the vanilla structures by changing their loot and how they generate.
Please note that this is a datapack Ported as a Mod and therefore doesn't add new blocks, items or mobs.

name: Dumbass Survivors
summary: Mow down thousands of night creatures and survive until dawn! Dumbass Survivors is a gothic horror casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to quickly snowball against hundreds of monsters. Except you're stuck babysitting the guy who thinks he's the hero.

name: Dungeon Adventure
summary: Embark on an unforgettable journey in Dungeon Adventure, a roguelite dungeon crawler where every delve is a new challenge. Traverse treacherous labyrinths filled with cunning traps, fearsome monsters, and hidden secrets.

name: Dungeon Drops
summary: Jump, fight and climb your way out of the ever-changing depths of the Snake Castle in Dungeon Drops!

name: Dungeon Destroyer
summary: Dungeon filled with complex and diverse gimmicks. shooting exploration resource acquisition growth game

name: Dungeon Janitor
summary: A puzzlescript experiment, creating disorder and tasking the player with cleaning it up

name: Dungeon Janitor
summary: Dungeon Janitor is a game where you play as a Janitor who's job is to clean dungeons after heroes made their way into it. Heal monsters, repair torches, make your way through the top to earn your pay!

name: Dungeon With Girl
summary: Conquer dungeons and flirt with girls in this roguelite RPG! You'll need wisdom, courage, and luck to traverse these mysterious depths and secure the best ending for you and your unexpected travel companion Monica.

name: Dual Shadows
summary: Dual Shadows is a combat-focused action game set in Pulsanh, a neon-drenched city powered by the imprisoned energy of two divine beings: the Phoenix and the Dragon. You play as Linh, a synthetic lifeform forged by the tech conglomerate Harmoni —spliced from fragments of the beasts she’s sent to destroy.

name: Dustwind: Resistance
summary: Dustwind: Resistance is a single-player tactical game. Lead your squad—including your dog—against a brutal raider army. Pause to plan tactics. Use brutal firepower, stealth, traps, turrets, or an armored car to outmaneuver enemies. Protect your home and freedom. No surrender!

name: Dustoria
summary: Shape a quiet settlement in a forgotten desert. Keep your people comfortable, manage scarce resources, and slowly expand your city.

name: Duskmarch
summary: Create a hero, explore, fight, and unravel stories in Duskmarch RPG!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Neverwinter Nights 2: Enhanced Edition
summary: The Fate of The Forgotten Realms is in Your Hands. Return to the city of Neverwinter in Dungeons & Dragons Neverwinter Nights 2: Enhanced Edition.

name: Duke Nukem: D-Day
summary: Duke Nukem: D-Day, also known as Duke Nukem: Man of Valor, is a canceled third-person shooter video game that was being developed by n-Space for the PlayStation 2. It began development in 1999 and was canceled in 2003.

name: Dungeon Legend Party
summary: This is a dungeon style roguelike adventure game, Choose your dungeon hero to participate in this adventure.

name: Dungeons of Uhr
summary: "Dungeons of Uhr" – A gripping first-person RPG where you explore treacherous dungeons filled with ancient secrets, deadly creatures, and hidden treasures. Craft gear, master survival skills, and uncover the dark mystery buried deep within the labyrinthine depths.

name: Dungeon Legends: Quest Hunter
summary:
Help your people! Join the fight against the Skeleton King, and become a hero in the dungeons.

Live a real adventure with the best online Action RPG game. Enjoy Dungeon Legends for free, and discover an endless world of challenges.

Fight against other players in REAL-TIME in the Arena, and become a legend of the dungeons. Go over the dungeons looking for incredible TREASURES, or ask for help to overcome the challenges of the online CO-OPERATIVE MODE. Join a CLAN and fight to conquer the dungeons.

Trains your skills and adapt your character to your gameplay. Turn your Dwarf into a WARRIOR, HEALER, or PROTECTOR by choosing the skills, and the items you wear before each game.

name: Dungeon Gems
summary: Choose your element and sharpen your mind in an epic thrilling RPG-style game with fast-paced PUZZLE gameplay. With hundreds of Heroes to choose from, battle through dungeons of fire and ice and hunt down the dragons, all in gorgeous 3D!

name: Dungeon Weiqi
summary: Dungeon Weiqi is a card roguelike strategy game. In this game, the player assume the role of a kingdom's lord. Through your journey, you'll collect cards, construct decks, progressively empower your capabilities, and confront escalating challenges."

name: Dungeon Sweeper
summary: A tactical roguelike that blends classic Minesweeper with auto-battler combat. Flag hidden monsters to avoid fights or trigger them and battle for loot. Explore randomized dungeons, gear up, and survive as long as you can.

name: Dustless
summary: Dustless is a side-scrolling action-adventure game set in a wuxia world, featuring a richly layered combat system.

name: Dungeon Picnic
summary: Dungeon Picnic is a game that combines RPG and Roguelike. Build your own strongest party by using the synergy of various characters and skills. Become an explorer, gather companions, and conquer the dungeon in other dimensions!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Red Fens
summary: Something fishy is happening in the swamp: devious creatures from the depths of the sea have come; bringing piles of valuable pearls, evil traps, and a deadly plan that is out of this world. Delve beneath the fens to uncover the creature’s sinister secrets before the flood gates open and doom is unleashed.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Necropolis, Part 4
summary:
As the gates of death open, the Black Abbot beckons Stormreach’s finest to witness the birth of a god. The hour of ascension is upon us! Can Eberron’s newest deity be defeated?

This adventure collection includes several dungeons, a large wilderness area and a raid. It is some of the most challenging content in the game and requires great teamwork.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Dreaming Dark
summary: For thousands of years the Dreaming Dark have watched and waited in our dreams. Now at long last they strike. Horrific creatures from the Plane of Nightmares threaten to overrun Xen’drik and it’s up to you to defeat them. Explore five new dungeons that will send you back in time, explain ancient mysteries of the Giants, and take you to the Plane of Nightmares itself.

name: Dust Walkers
summary: Recruit DUST WALKERS to go on dangerous expeditions to extract Dust, the most valuable resource in the galaxy! Collect resources, build defenses, acquire weapons, and choose upgrades to collect and deploy the most powerful Dust Walkers you can.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Harbinger of Madness
summary: Mysterious disappearances have the entire city on edge. Investigate the fates of the missing, dare to face hidden horrors that have broken the sanity of so many others, and destroy the monstrous perpetrator before it consumes your mind. Contains 4 hand-crafted adventures in the streets of Stormreach.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Mines of Tethyamar
summary: The Dwarves have returned to the Mines of Tethyamar to seek fabulous treasure, only to find the Drow of the Underdark are after it as well. This DLC contains five adventures with an appearance by one of the Forgotten Realms' most intriguing villains.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Haunted Halls of Eveningstar
summary: Rumors say treasures still await those brave enough to delve into the depths of the Haunted Halls. A classic D&D module brought to life narrated by Forgotten Realms creator Ed Greenwood. This is an enormous dungeon with dozens of side objectives. It can be replayed in an extended mode with new content and developer commentary.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Devils of Shavarath
summary: The time has come to battle the devil armies of Shavarath on their own ground. Journey to Shavarath to end once and for all the invasion of Xen'drik! Avoid the lethal traps set for you along the way, wage war against the devil army, and thwart the strategies of their most powerful commanders. Contains several challenging quest dungeons, an adventure area and a raid.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Magic of Myth Drannor
Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Race - Eladrin
summary: Unleash the Eladrin’s seasonal magic with this character race. Master versatile combat styles and elemental spells that shift with the seasons, bringing the Feywild's power to your fingertips.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Eladrin Chaosmancer
Dungeons & Dragons Online: Magic of Myth Drannor - Ultimate Fan Bundle
summary: A bundle containing all of the Myth Drannor expansion in-game store content. This bundle includes exclusive cosmetics, mounts, hirelings, pets and a teleportation trinket. It also features a racial point tome, additional character slots, expanded bank space, and a hireling folder.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Epic Destiny - Machrotechnic
summary:
This is an arcane epic destiny that can be purchased in the in-game store, or included with some editions of the Vecna Unleashed expansion.

The Machrotechnic wields the devastating power of both the lightning strike and the destructive sonic boom that follows. With mastery over arcane and mechanical devices, the Machrotechnic can wield a variety of devices to enhance themselves and their allies against harm or interfere with their foes.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Tabaxi Trailblazer
Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Isle of Dread - Ultimate Fan Bundle
summary: A bundle containing all of the Isle of Dread expansion in-game store content. This includes exclusive cosmetics, pets, a dinosaur mount and a raptor hireling. It also contains a tome of destiny, teleportation map, additional character slot, and instant level up boxes.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Universal Tree - Feydark Illusionist
Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Race - Shifter
Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Razorclaw Shifter
Dungeons & Dragons Online: Fables of the Feywild - Ultimate Fan Bundle
summary: A bundle containing all of the Fables of the Feywild expansion in-game store content. This includes exclusive cosmetics, a unicorn mount, a displacer beast pet and a satyr hireling. It also contains a tome of destiny, teleportation tuning fork and an additional character slot.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Universal Tree - Inquisitive
summary:
Inquisitives are investigators who specialize in solving mysteries and shedding light on the darkest secrets. They gain skills that focus on Diplomacy, Law/Chaos damage, finding hidden things, and a new Dual-Crossbow combat style.

Any Light or Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow you equip splits into two smaller hand-crossbows in your hands, each firing a shot every time you attack. Both of these shots use the stats of your single (equipped) Crossbow. Get ready to hit the streets of Sharn and solve some mysteries!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Tiefling Scoundrel
Dungeons & Dragons Online: Masterminds of Sharn - Ultimate Fan Bundle
summary: A bundle containing all of the Masterminds of Sharn expansion in-game store content. This includes exclusive cosmetics, a bloodhound dog pet, a mechanical peacock pet, shield guardian hireling and a teleportation boarding pass. It also contains a tome of universal enhancement, dimensional augment bag and an additional character slot.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Universal Tree - Horizon Walker
summary:
This is a universal enhancement tree that can be purchased in the in-game store, or included with some editions of the Sinister Secrets of Saltmarsh expansion.

Horizon Walker primarily features enhancements focused on dealing force damage and on marking & debuffing a single enemy. It can be very useful for characters who fight with a bow.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Aasimar Scourge
summary:
Aasimar Scourge are imbued with a divine energy that blazes intensely within them. It feeds a powerful desire to destroy evil-a desire that is, at its best, unflinching and, at its worst, all-consuming.

This content was previously available in the Mists of Ravenloft expansion bundles, but now has to be purchased in the in-game store.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Universal Tree - Vistani Knife Fighter
summary:
Deadly Vistani Knife fighters use their blades to fight both in melee and at range. This universal enhancement tree can be used by all character classes, but is primarily focused on fighting with a dagger.

This content was previously available in the Mists of Ravenloft expansion bundles. It can now be purchased in the in-game store. Vistani Knife Fighter can also be obtained for free per character after completing all expansion quests at the highest difficulty levels.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Race - Aasimar
summary:
Carrying the blood of a celestial, an Aasimar is usually good-aligned and fights against evil in the world.

This content was previously available in the Mists of Ravenloft expansion bundles, but now has to be purchased in the in-game store.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Class - Alchemist
summary:
Alchemists mix magical components to create powerful arcane effects and coat their weapons in vile toxins. Alchemists are an arcane caster class that can be used to melee, range, or spellcast effectively.

This character class is only available in the in-game store and cannot be unlocked for free.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Class - Artificer
summary:
Artificers use a mix of magic and technology to augment items and blast foes. Wielding rapid-fire crossbows and magical rune arms, they have a fighting style unlike any other class. They also can build their own Iron Defender, a customizable pet that aids them in battle. Artificers are a blend of Rogue and Arcane classes, and can also play a supporting role as a party healer.

This character class can be purchased in the in-game store. Artificer can also be obtained for free after earning a large amount of House Cannith favor on a server.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Class - Favored Soul
summary:
Favored Souls draw on divine magic to both heal and destroy. Like clerics, Favored Souls have access to powerful healing spells, but they are also more skilled with weapons than any other spell caster. Like sorcerers, they get a larger number of spell points than other spell casters but cannot freely switch spells at taverns or rest shrines.

This character class can be purchased in the in-game store. Favored Soul can also be obtained for free after earning a large amount of favor across all quests on a server.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Secrets of the Artificers
summary: Home of the Artificers, House Cannith is an area where magic and mechanics converge. Born in war, forged in fury, Stormreach faces its most terrible foe yet as the Lord of Blades attacks the Cannith Manufactury. This is a premium quest pack featuring an adventure zone, 3 dungeons, and 2 raids.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Ruins of Gianthold
summary:
The Stormreaver has returned to the seat of his empire's power, and Xen'drik's most powerful creatures rally to his call. Can you unravel the mystery and quell this gathering storm before the Stormreaver and his minions fulfill the Prophecy?

Gianthold is one of the largest & most popular premium quest collections in Dungeons & Dragons Online. It contains a big adventure area, 10 dungeons, and 2 raids.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Vale of Twilight
summary:
