Vale of Twilight is the largest premium quest collection in Dungeons & Dragons Online. It features two adventure areas, seven dungeons, and three raids, including "The Shroud."

This was the most popular endgame content in Dungeons & Dragons Online for over five years. The Shroud allows players to customize every major type of equipment with its green steel crafting system.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: White Plume Mountain and Other Tales
summary:
An eccentric wizard has hidden three famous Sentient weapons inside of a volcano, and challenged all comers to try to retrieve them. Can you make it through fiendish obstacles and deadly traps?

The featured "White Plume Mountain" adventure is adapted from a classic D&D module. Four other short dungeons are included in this premium quest collection. The five quests are not part of a narrative arc, but instead tie thematically around wizards run amok.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Three-Barrel Cove
summary: A former pirate haven, Three-Barrel Cove is still a very rowdy outpost town on an island north of Stormreach. There are many dangerous adventures that await characters brave enough to explore Three-Barrel Cove. This premium quest collection contains an adventure area and 10 pirate-themed dungeons.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Phiarlan Carnival
summary: The freaks are all about when the Phiarlan Carnival hits town! It’s a circus of depravity and danger, and you have front-row seats for the show. But the lights and the glitter hide a terrible darkness, and you’re acting without a net when you confront the Phiarlan Carnival. This premium quest collection contains 4 short dungeons.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Against the Slave Lords
summary: A short set of premium dungeons adapted from the classic "Scourge of the Slave Lords" D&D modules, with narration by Travis Willingham.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Demon Sands
summary: The sprawling dunes of Menechtarun hide deadly secrets and are home to powerful enemies. This premium quest pack is one of the largest in Dungeons & Dragons Online. It contains an enormous adventure area, 10 dungeons, and a raid boss battle versus the Demon Queen Lailat. The Sands of Menechtarun includes the popular "Wiz King" dungeon, which is a giant tomb filled with mummies, traps and a lich.

name: Duncrush
summary: Duncrush is a clicker RPG where you defeat monsters by clicking and conquer a variety of dungeons. Collect gold, weapons, shields, and accessories to power up your hero and create your own strategy with the skill tree. Battle stronger enemies and clear challenging dungeons!

name: Dungeon Route
summary:
Explore the dungeon along the arrow!
The longer you walk, the more buffs you get and the more advantageous you are in battle!

name: Duck vs. Evil
summary: Craft custom spells to snowball into an unstoppable force in this rogue-lite adventure. Clear many waves in all levels in order to save the world from evil creatures while upgrading your powers in between runs.

name: Dungeon Raid
summary: Dungeon Raid is an adventure card roguelike. Dive deeper and deeper into the dungeon. Use everything you find to defeat enemies and kill the final boss. Good luck! And try not to die... from hunger.

name: Dumpster Baby
summary: Dumpster Baby is a game about being queer and homeless, and the importance of community and friendship in hard times. You play as Bandit, an optimistic racoon meeting new friends as he tries to find people to be roommates with. A narrative focused single player experience.

name: Dungeons of Paint
summary: Can you colour the entire world with a gun?

name: Duo Games
summary: Fun, fast, and fiercely competitive – perfect for two players on one Nintendo Switch!

name: Dungeon CompAInions
summary: In Dungeon CompAInions, choose a class—Mage, Druid, or Ranger—while AI-controlled allies help you survive waves of enemies. Pause to slow the pace at a cost, or push on for higher scores. Earn upgrades after each round as difficulty steadily increases.

name: Duck Blitz
summary: Duck Blitz is a fast-paced arcade shooter that invites you to ruffle some feathers in the most quacktastic way possible! Grab your trusty blaster, dive into a flurry of colorful ducks swooping in from all angles, and chase high scores in frantic, action-packed rounds.

name: Dungeon Fight Tactics
summary: An Auto Battler game where you strategically assemble a team of characters to enter randomly generated dungeons. Customize your characters with items and skills from spellbooks, then let them fight automatically for victory. Build your unique team and conquer the dungeon!

name: Dumb AF
summary: Dumb AF is a 3D, Stylized platformer where you tackle challenging obstacles on a quest to reach an ancient pyramid. Dodge lethal sandstorms and navigate absurd, goofy traps in a funny, high-stakes race that tests your reflexes and wit.

name: Durga: The Lionhearted
summary: Play as Durga, a fearless village girl on a journey of survival and self-discovery. A story driven RPG blends puzzles with adventure into the Indian forest. Unravel ancient Indian tales, face wild beasts, and embrace a legacy that transforms her from a brave villager to a guardian of culture.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Chill of Ravenloft
summary: Venture to Lamordia, a land forever bound by ice and shrouded in darkness. Amidst bleak alleys, derelict factories, and grotesque laboratories, sinister secrets fester beneath the surface; mysterious disappearances, grisly murders, and ghastly experiments gone awry. Confront the scientific horrors crafted by the brilliant but terrifying Dr. Viktra Mordenheim.

name: Dude Called Barry
summary: Run across short fast paced levels, comboing movement abilities to try and get to the finish line as quickly as possible

name: Duelyst: Blitz
summary: Build your deck, command units in lightning-fast turn-based duels. With beautifully animated pixel art, Blitz brings the soul of Duelyst into a more intense experience.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Tangleroot Gorge
summary: Home to many fierce hobgoblin and bugbear tribes, Tangleroot Gorge also contains the infamous Hobgoblin fortress of Splinterskull. This quest pack contains a small explorer area and a short series of dungeons for low level adventurers.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Catacombs
summary: The Church of the Silver Flame maintains a Sanctuary for the insane within the boundaries of Stormreach's Market ward. Stormreach denizens refer to it as "The Catacombs". This quest pack contains a short series of undead-themed dungeons for low level and epic adventurers.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Fall of the Night Brigade
summary: Help a group of wererats to bring down the Night Brigade, a ruthless gang that's killed and pillaged its way into power. Transform into a rat to explore hidden nooks and crannies and bring the leaders of the Night Brigade to justice in four hand-crafted quests set inside Wheloon Prison.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Necropolis, Part 1
summary: A quest pack for low level adventurers with a short series of undead-themed dungeons.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Sorrowdusk Isle
summary: An island further to the west of Three-Barrel Cove, Sorrowdusk Isle is shrouded in mystery. Rumors occasionally trickle back to Stormreach of powerful troll and ogre clans, and of cults who worship the Dark Six. But while rumors trickle back to Stormreach, adventurers who leave for Sorrowdusk seem to never return. This quest pack contains an explorer area and a series of short dungeons for low level players.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Hunter and Hunted
summary: You've received an invitation from the Master of the Hunt to partake in a series of deadly challenges. This quest pack contains two dungeons for low level characters and an endgame raid for legendary characters.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Sentinels of Stormreach
summary: Join the Sentinels in swashbuckling adventures as they seek to defeat the pirate scourge. But don’t think you’re safe once the seas are clear: the skies themselves will rain scurvy death—and scurvy undead. Because when this pillaging pirate captain runs short of troops, he just brings back the ones you’ve already disposed of. This quest pack contains a short series of dungeons for low level characters.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Necropolis, Part 2
summary: A quest pack with a series of shadow-themed dungeons for mid level adventurers.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Ruins of Threnal
summary: House Deneith and House Kundarak have temporarily joined forces to explore and excavate the Abandoned Keep, a settlement deep in the heart of Xen’drik that has lain abandoned for hundreds of years. But the evil that destroyed the settlement 500 years ago still awaits those foolish enough to dig deep enough below the Abandoned Keep.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Dragonblood Prophecy
summary: A dragon-themed quest pack featuring two medium level dungeons and two endgame raids. Creatures and beasts of all kinds have rallied to help the Dragons who are wreaking havoc through-out Stormreach. Kor-Kaza has taken control of an ancient giant site with immense power, enough to wash Stormreach into the sea. Breach the site of the ancient people, stop the raging storm, and smite the dragon where it stands.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Restless Isles
summary: The fires of the Twilight Forge glow hot and fierce as plans are made for war across Eberron. This is a small quest pack featuring a maze-like adventure zone, two dungeons, and a raid for mid-level characters.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Path of Inspiration
summary: The Inspired rebuilt Stormreach's Old Harbor, but are the Inspired a dream come true or a nightmare? Dare to explore and be taken beneath the Harbor, to a savage island, and into your own mind as you discover the Inspired's terrible secret. A quest pack with several short dungeons for high level adventurers.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The High Road of Shadows
summary: Oriphanun Huntsilver's journal, containing a fabled Nether Scroll, has vanished and the Harpers are in need of your help to retrieve it. This is a small quest pack for high level characters with an adventure area and five short quests.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Heart of Madness
summary: The insane lords of Xoriat return to Eberron. Tour the Palace of Stone, experience the latest in Mind Flayer fashion, and return to the Sleeping Spell Inn for the ultimate excursion into madness in Terminal Delirium. This is a small quest pack for high level characters with 3 dungeons.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Eveningstar Challenge Pack
summary: Help the Dryads to defend their grove from the evil Drow invaders. Fight beside War Wizards and Purple Dragon Knights as you work to reclaim a ruined keep. Prove your worth to the denizens of the Underdark in their brutal arena. This challenge pack contains six short, repeatable quests with random rewards.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Druid's Deep
summary: Fight a strange corruption of nature that has come out of the King's Forest to threaten Eveningstar. Unravel the mystery of its cause in a tale that introduces new allies, new enemies, and troubling riddles that can only be answered down in the very heart of Druid's Deep. This is a quest pack that contains four short dungeons for high level characters.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Reaver's Reach
summary: This is a quest pack for high level characters with four small explorer areas and four challenging dungeons.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Devil's Gambit
summary: Defend Stormreach from demonic invaders! The Devils have come to the city of Stormreach - and they have strange new powers. This quest pack has four adventures: meet a Green Slaad, befriend a bear, battle in the streets of House Cannith and protect Stormreach's most unusual tavern.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Soul Splitter
summary: This adventure pack contains six dungeons for high level characters. Explore previously unseen parts of Sharn as you search for an old acquaintance. Uncover a vile conspiracy that seeks to enslave the city’s Warforged, visit Sharn's most luxurious private clubs, and discover the shocking surprise lurking in a mad wizard’s hidden base.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Necropolis, Part 3
summary: A quest pack featuring five undead-themed adventures. This collection includes the "Tomb of the Tormented", which requires players to very patiently guide rats through a trap-filled maze.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Peril of the Planar Eyes
summary: Help scholars from Morgrave University as they search Xen'drik for the Planar Eyes, mysterious artifacts tied to the power of Eberron's planes. But be careful - the Eyes are also sought by a new and mysterious cult known as the Hidden Hand! This quest pack contains 4 dungeons for medium level and legendary characters.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Slice of Life
summary: Daily life in Sharn isnt quite as ordinary as some would believe. Take part in a cooking competition, renovate a home, and go on an educational date in this "totally ordinary" series of quests. This adventure pack contains 3 dungeons for high level and legendary characters.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Tavern Tales
summary: This quest pack contains three dungeons for very low level and legendary characters. Strange things are happening in The King's Forest! Villagers blame a local hag, but it's up to you to discover the far more sinister truth. City workers have discovered a previously unexplored section in the Sunken Sewers. Things are getting tense in the Stormreach Fish Market as local Sahuagin struggle with the Kobold Union for control. Bring order to the chaos in an adventure with multiple possible endings.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Reign of Madness
summary: When a mad lord of Xoriat roams free, no one can remain sane. Visit an asylum where sanity is the disease, explore the depths of madness in a visit to Xoriat, turn the great Xorian lords against each other, and free the Tower of the Twelve from the grip of insanity. This adventure pack contains 4 dungeons for high level players.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Grip of the Hidden Hand
summary: Collect the rest of the Planar Eyes for Morgrave University for a wealthy benefactor before the Cult of the Hidden Hand meddles in your plans. This adventure pack contains 5 quest dungeons for high level and legendary characters.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Trials of the Archons
summary: Forge an alliance with the celestial Archons. Battle a Demon swarm, prove your worth to the Archons, learn the secrets of the Devils' leader, and battle an Erinyes. This adventure pack contains 3 dungeons for medium level and legendary characters, and also an endgame raid.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Disciples of Rage
summary: The magic that has long protected Stormreach is failing, and a strange plague is sweeping through the city. This adventure pack contains 5 quests for medium level and legendary characters.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Race - Dhampir
summary: Dhampir are characters with innate connections to death and undeath. Many are half-Vampires one way or another, and have a life-draining bite.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Dhampir Dark Bargainer
summary: Dark Bargainers are Dhampir who have made bargains with the Dark Powers. They have connections to the Mists (regardless of their origins) and can manipulate them to their advantage. Dark Bargainer characters have a modified unique racial skill tree. They start with a level in the Warlock class.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Chill of Ravenloft - Ultimate Fan Bundle
summary: A bundle containing all of the Chill of Ravenloft expansion in-game store content. This includes exclusive cosmetics, an alchemist hireling, two mounts, a pet brain in a jar, and a cat-like gremishka pet. It also contains additional bank storage, a tome of universal enhancement for every character, and a teleportation trinket.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Universal Tree - Falconry
summary:
The Falconry Universal Enhancement Tree gives players the ability to use a Hunting Bird to make coordinated attacks on targets, and hones the character's ability to make pinpoint attacks.

This extra skill tree can be purchased in the in-game store. Falconry can also be obtained for free per character after completing almost every Free Agents quest at the highest difficulty levels, which is incredibly difficult and time consuming.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Universal Tree - Harper Agent
summary:
This elusive organization of bards, mages and other adventurers are famed for their devotion to the arts, the preservation of history, and maintaining the balance of civilization and nature. Their often-secretive agents know one another by a silver harp pin.

This extra skill tree can be purchased in the in-game store. The Harper universal tree can also be obtained for free per server after completing most Harper Agent patron quests at the highest difficulty levels. These quests are in premium adventure packs and the Shadowfell Conspiracy expansion.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Archetype - Dragon Lord
summary:
An add-on available for purchase in the store. You can make a new character that plays as a variant of the fighter class.

Dragon Lords model their tactics after the ferocity of dragons to demoralize and subdue their enemies. They excel in crowd control, defense, and Draconic power.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Premium Archetype - Dragon Disciple
summary:
An add-on available for purchase in the store. You can make a new character that plays as a variant of the monk class.

Dragon Disciples are Monks who have devoted themselves to the Way of the Mighty Dragon. While Centered, they can tap into Draconic magic. They gain limited Wisdom-based spellcasting.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Deep Gnome
summary:
An arcane illusionist with affinity for the fathomless darks of the earth. Deep Gnome characters have a modified unique racial skill tree. They start with a level in the Wizard class.

Svirfneblin are said to dwell in great cities deep underground. A svirfneblin has wiry, rock-colored skin usually medium brown to brownish gray.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Sun Elf (Morninglord)
summary:
A battle-ready Cleric of the great sun-god who wields holy light against the dark in all its wicked forms. Morninglord characters have a modified unique racial skill tree. They start with a level in the Cleric class.

This was originally included with some Shadowfell Conspiracy expansion bundles, but now has to be purchased in the in-game store.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Bladeforged
summary:
"You were built for war. With a greatsword in hand, you mercilessly smite your foes and leave behind only a wake of destruction."

Bladeforged characters have a modified unique racial skill tree. They start with a level in the Paladin class. This was originally included with some Shadowfell Conspiracy expansion bundles, but now has to be purchased in the in-game store.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Purple Dragon Knight
summary:
A stalwart Fighter, cut loose from active service, who can lead the charge with rallying battle-cry.

Purple Dragon Knight characters have a modified unique racial skill tree. They start with a level in the Fighter class. This was originally included with some Shadowfell Conspiracy expansion bundles, but now has to be purchased in the in-game store.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Iconic Race - Shadar-kai
summary:
A lethal Rogue who has thrown off the Netherese yoke and draws on innate powers of the Shadowfell to hide and to kill.

Shadar-kai characters have a unique racial skill tree. They start with a level in the Rogue class. This was originally included with some Shadowfell Conspiracy expansion bundles, but now has to be purchased in the in-game store.

name: Dungeon Market Simulator
summary: A strategic medieval market simulation game. Equip your dungeon with traps. Hunt down outcast warriors and earn mysterious chests. Upgrade the items you obtain and increase their value. Bargain with customers and earn promotions.

name: Duke Nukem 64
summary:
2018 Build Engine PC port of Duke Nukem 64 packaged in the "rednukem" release.

Created by the EDuke32 Team!

name: DungeonBox
summary: A new Dungeons & Dragons Party Game! Let our Dungeon Master take you and up to 8 players on an adventure, where you control the next move by answering and voting from your phones

name: Dungeon Killing
summary: When holy light fails, only killing can rewrite salvation. 《Dungeon Killing》is a dark fantasy match-3 roguelike where you command 8 fallen paladins, wield 16 unique skills, and face personal Nemeses in procedurally generated dungeons. Every match is a moral choice—purge? revenge?embrace corruption?

name: Dungeons 4: Tales from the Campfire
summary: Stay a while and listen by the fireplace, while Thalya, Tristan and the ever-eloquent Narrator live through the true horror of soothing the sleepless miniature version of the Absolute Evil, Gorgu, in Dungeons 4 - Tales from the Campfire.

name: Dusttale: Non est Deus
summary: This game is based off of Halo's Dusttale by Haloboi3. It's recommended that you play UNDERTALE before playing this game.

name: Dungeon Cleaners
summary: They came; they died. Now it's your job to clean up their mess.

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Dragonshard
summary: A D&D real-time strategy game with a story written by the creator of the Eberron setting. This re-release added support for modern resolutions and other fixes to perform better on today's PCs.

name: Dungeon Squire
summary: It's a direct descendant of Dragonsweeper, which in turn is a spin of Mamono Sweeper. The game focuses on Android gameplay (touch, small screen size) and uses Kenneys tiny-dungeon assets and sounds from freesound.org.

name: Dungeon Run
summary: Return to the days of old when men were men and warlocks drank root beer. Blaze through this comedicly delightful dungeon crawler with a tip of your helm to the old days of Arcades! Uncommon/Rare/Epic/Legendaries with bizarre powers,magic find,gems,levelups & stats. Level up

name: Dunthera
summary: Towers have always defended you… Now it’s your turn to keep them standing. Battle unique monsters across diverse maps, each with distinct abilities, looks, and stats. Upgrade your hero and fortify structures to hold the line!

name: Dungeon Parkour Block Puzzle Adventure
summary: Dungeon Parkour Block Puzzle Adventure is exactly what it sounds like. A dungeon puzzle-platformer where you place blocks to guide your adventurer, who parkours through the dungeons! Collect stars to upgrade adventurer's parkour skills.

name: Duel Champions
summary: Play quick card duels, open booster packs to discover new cards with powerful synergies and build your best deck in this Singleplayer Roguelike Deckbuilder inspired by Trading Card Games.

name: Duck Duck Goose
summary: A dumb but funny hide-and-seek game where you hunt for a quacking duck across strange maps. It quacks every few minutes… but you’re not alone. Find the duck before the duck (or something else) finds you.

name: Dungeons of Hinterberg: Episode Renaud
summary:
Get ready for a brand-new adventure in Episode Renaud.

This exciting prequel introduces Renaud, the mysterious fan-favorite character, now fully playable. Dive into Renaud’s dark and intense journey, which offers thrilling new insights that connect directly to Luisa’s adventure in the main game.

name: Duty 3: Factory Guard
summary: Duty 3 : Factory Guard is a single player survival horror game where your job is to monitor the incoming trucks while fending off an entity that inches closer every second.

name: Dune: Awakening - Dune Film Stillsuit
summary: Don the Dune (2021) Film Stillsuit, and survive the desert like a true Fremen.

name: Dungeon Reborn
summary: Prepare to descend into the depths of Dungeon Reborn, a thrilling RPG dungeon crawler that will test your courage and cunning. Explore treacherous dungeons, battle hordes of fearsome foes, and uncover powerful loot.

name: Dunkadillo
summary: Finally, a game that answers the age-old question: “What if a basketball was also an armadillo?”

name: Dungeon Ball: Balance Ball
summary:
New Balance Ball game. You will have a lot of fun playing Dungeon Balance Ball.
This game is pushing mobile graphics to the limits. High-end devices are recommended for optimal gameplay for Balance 3D.

name: Dungeons, Dungeons and more... Dice?
summary: What if your dice turned on you? What if instead of the roller, you were the rolled? Find out in this DnD inspired bullet hell!

name: Dunestake
summary: Dunestake is a single player, high-risk & high-reward auto battler, with an emphasis on combat bets, offering a wide variety of strategies & combos. Stake your units for gold and cross your fingers, for the dunes can be cruel.

name: Dumb Witchfinder
summary: Dumb Witchfinder is a 2D pixel roguelike platformer where you play as a dark elf battling demons in a forest. Dodge enemy attacks and kill them to upgrade your abilities.

name: Dune: Awakening - The Lost Harvest
summary:
The Lost Harvest is a paid DLC with a complete standalone storyline. A carryall transporting a Miner’s Guild spice harvester has been shot out of the sky, and its cargo could change everything. Your job is to find it.

The DLC also includes several unique cosmetics, including a brand-new vehicle, the Treadwheel, complete with its own unique animations and tier upgrades. The vehicle and other cosmetics provide no material benefit over its base game counterpart.

Other cosmetics include several armor and weapon skins, and the Dune Man building set, letting you build bases in the style of those pragmatic and weathered workers of Arrakis.

name: Dune: Awakening - Chapter 2
summary: Chapter 2 the first major content update. Embark on the next chapter of the main story following the sinister revelations at the end of Chapter 1. Explore new locations, meet new and familiar faces, delve deeper into the nature of your origins, and unravel a web that stretches into the darkest corners of the Imperium.

name: Dude My House Is Haunted
summary: Welcome to a Haunted house full of ghostly shenanigans and spooky jump scares! You are a top G ghost hunter and you must capture all the ghostly anomalies that terrorize this luxurious home. This isn't just paranormal activity, this is paranormal BRUH-tivity.

name: DungeonCrawlers
summary: The second original game by Kusanohito Channel!! Form a team of unique characters and conquer a fully randomly generated dungeon! Use the items you find along the way to defeat the powerful boss waiting in the deepest level!

name: Dungeon Destroyer
summary: An innovative roguelike puzzle game that changes your fate by reconstructing dungeons. With an auto-navigating hero and floors offering endless retries, each randomly generated dungeon presents fresh challenges. Enjoy a casual yet authentic adventure

name: Dungeon Survivor
summary: Collect food, slay monsters, and stay alive as you explore the canyons, caves, and dungeons.

name: Dungeons of Edera 2
summary: Return to the land of Edera, where you play as a sword-for-hire, exploring environments, competing for contracts, and waging guerrilla warfare to become a legendary mercenary, alone or with friends.

name: Dungeon Bodega Simulator
summary: Dungeon Bodega Simulator is a retro styled fantasy shop game where you can grow crops, brew potions, sell items and raise slimes as pets! Can you build up your bodega into a one stop adventuring shop while solving the mysteries of the dungeon beneath you?

name: Dubai Chocolate Simulator
summary: An Arab man asks you to make Dubai chocolate. Box, race horses, complete obstacle courses, defeat enemies, and gather ingredients to craft the Dubai chocolate!

name: Duel of Shadows
summary: Shadows meet with blades. Fight the boss at the end of the dungeon.

name: Dun Dun Crawl
summary: Dun Dun Crawl is a creature-collector roguelite. Command monsters, battle foes, complete mini-games, make strategic choices, and face powerful dungeon bosses!

name: Dungeon Shifters
summary: Dungeon Shifters is an action RPG set in a world broken by a magic comet. Explore ancient dungeons, uncover lost secrets, and battle deadly ememies in third-person combat. Choose your adventurer and shape your fate in the depths.

name: Dungeon Defenders: Warden Hero DLC
summary: An ancient forest spirit seeking tranquillity, the Warden joins the battle against the Old One's army. While at fist glance she might look peaceful, if you get on her bad side you'll be in for a world of hurt. With powerful abilities, she tries to protect even the smallest of critters from harm.

name: Dungeon Tracer
summary: A puzzle RPG where you connect tiles to fight and survive strategically in ever-changing dungeons.

name: Dungeon Maiden: Survivor
summary: "Dungeon Maiden: Survivor" combines horde-shooting, roguelite builds, character growth & cosmetic swaps. Strategic choices empower your maiden through escalating upgrades, blending frenetic combat with deep meta-progression.

name: Dungero
summary: Dive into the realm of offline roguelike action RPG. Game with easy gameplay, innovation, and addictive loot mechanics. Fight Monsters, Crawl Dungeons, Loot treasures, Have fun

name: Dungeon Pizza
summary: A cooking game with a fantasy twist! Knead the dough, spread the sauce, and prepare… the rat chunks?! Open your own pizzeria deep inside a dungeon, serving weary adventurers who come to rest and refuel between their quests and bounties.

name: Duck Dash
summary: A fun and simple 2D platformer game about a duck named Scruffles. Fight your way through 10 levels with a smooth feeling movement system.

name: Dungeon Raid: Zero Floor
summary: Dungeon Raid is an adventure card roguelike. Dive deeper and deeper into the dungeon. Use everything you find to defeat enemies and kill the final boss. Good luck! And try not to die... from hunger.

name: Dungeonought
summary: Dungeonought, a third-person action co-op multiplayer dungeon-crawler game

name: Dungeon Run
summary: Race through 100 floors of massive dungeons, collect all the keys, and compete for glory!

name: DuskVeil
summary: In duskveil you play as scientist who wakes up in a tunnel with no knowledge to what lead him there. The game will take you in adventure of discovering the horrors of Site 446 that went into lock down due to a mysterious virus outbreak.

name: Dungeonborne Settlement
summary: Defeat monsters in dungeons, gather resources, grow your settlement, and combine and enhance tactics to lead the battle. Use auto-battle and flexible challenges to create and change tactics as you face stronger dungeons.

name: Dumpster Divers
summary: Dumpster Divers is an online co-op scavenging game where rejected puppets turn trash into treasure. Dive into alleys and dumpsters with up to 4 friends, outsmart bumbling cops, and haul your loot home to sell. Use scraps to craft helpful tools and climb the ranks of society one dumpster at a time.

name: Dumbz Snake
summary: Crawl across the island controlling a lively and agile snake, make it grow by absorbing orbs of light, and blast your enemies with your skills!

name: Duel Timers
summary: Duel Timers is a local multiplayer FPS Platformer. Fight against a friend with On-the-Couch Local Multiplayer or through Steam Remote Play (All multiplayer requires a Bluetooth Gamepad). Jump from platform to platform on a vertical arena to avoid enemy players and the impending void!

name: Dump of the Dead X
summary: Heavily drawing inspiration from the likes of Zombies Ate My Neighbors, DUMP OF THE DEAD X casts you as a guy who's just chilling in every man's safe space — the bathroom.

name: Dunk Trickster 2
summary: The streets are calling us again! It's time to play!

name: Duì Yǐng Shì Jiè
summary: This is a platformer puzzle game where players simultaneously control two characters in different dimensions. Using unique tools, alter the state of the world, solve intricate puzzles, and guide both characters to their destinations.

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Tiny Adventures
summary: Dungeons & Dragons: Tiny Adventures was a social idle role-playing game on Facebook.

name: DuoZuplixo
summary: DuoZuplixo is a 2D platforming collect-a-thon with some RPG elements. You'll be taking control of two characters, Dr. Zuplow & Nora. You'll be able to switch between these two on the fly, and will need to make use of both of their abilities to collect all the Zuplonium Orbs and proceed through the areas. Alongside the Zuplonium Orbs you'll also find other secrets hidden throughout, such as Health & Attack Upgrades & tokens that allow you to access 3D bonus levels.​

name: Durak Online
summary: Fast-paced, strategic card game, playable with 2 - 6 players or 1 - 3 bots!

name: Duel Legends
summary: Duel Legends - a revolutionary auto-battler card game where strategy meets dynamic combat. Step into a world where every card you play transforms your hero into an unstoppable force.

name: DungeonRoute
summary: In this shifting dungeon, you may only move along arrow directions. Tiles vanish once stepped on, and the layout reshuffles! The farther you walk, the greater the combat buffs and treasure loot. Plan your path carefully and keep going deeper—how far can you descend into the abyss?

name: Duelmasters
summary: Battle your friends in fast-paced 1v1 arena brawler style duels. Choose from axe, sword, or spear, each with its own strengths, and fight through intense rounds. Outplay your opponent, become champion of the arena, and earn the title of Duelmaster!

name: Duckstroma
summary: Meet Aura, she's a delivery duck and about to have a life changing day on the job. A client has requested 8 disks be delivered to them, but this won't be an easy task. Using Aura's skills navigate the hostile environment by bouncing on weak foes, even lay an egg to reach higher spots.

name: Duck Life 4 Classic
summary: The Flash-era classic returns! Duck Life 4 Classic is the original, now in HD with modern quality-of-life polish. Grind training mini-games, crush races and tournaments, and build, name, and style a custom duck team. No browser needed, just pure nostalgia on PC

name: Dungeons and Degenerate Gamblers
summary: A blackjack roguelite with wonderful music, a whimsical tone, and lots of synergies to explore to bust your opponent with.

name: DuckStruck
summary: DuckStruck is a fast paced, top down bullet hell pixel art shooter, where you play as... a duck! Battle enemy zombie ducks, and build defences to aid your survival with endless waves of enemies attacking you at every moment!

name: Duck Norris Tales
summary: Duck Norris Tales is a run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles. Play as a brave duck saving the world from an alien invasion. Make friends, discover secrets, wield face melting weapons and most of all shoot first and ask questions later.

name: Dungeon Danger Traps 2
summary: Dungeon Danger Traps 2 is a free hardcore platformer with multiplayer, where every move matters. Dodge deadly traps, find the shortest route to the finish line, and compete for the best time!

name: Dungeon Escape
summary: A 3D co-op escape room game for 1 to 4 players in which you explore eerie, interconnected dungeon rooms filled with puzzles, hidden obstacles, and cryptic secrets—working solo or in tandem to unlock the route to freedom.

name: Dungeon Brawl
summary: Dungeon Brawl is a casual-yet-intense online co-op roguelike action game! Choose from dozens of anime-style heroes, freely combine hundreds of skills and relics, and team up with your friends to carve through hordes of enemies. Build your own fighting style and dive into the blood-soaked chaos!

name: Duty Free Shop Simulator
summary: Run your own airport duty free shop, manage stocks, catch smugglers, sell & grow!

name: Duality Shift
summary: Duality Shift is a Singleplayer FPS Time-Attack Platformer with a unique reality-switching mechanic - Run, Jump, Switch, Shoot and perform parkour moves on your way to the highest position on the leaderboard. Can you beat your friends' score and uncover the truth of the world you inhabit?

name: DualVerse86
summary: A 2D retro speedrunner where every second counts. Switch between worlds, dodge traps, beat the clock.

name: Dungeon Forge
summary: You are a blacksmith, not a hero. Create weapons with countless unique combinations, exploit monsters’ weaknesses, and supply heroes with what will determine their fate.

name: Dungeon Sucker
summary: Dungeon Sucker is a 2D roguelite shooter. For the upcoming dungeon inspection, the Demon left for her summer vacation and entrusted the cleaning to an agency. Armed with the “Mighty Vacuum,” you can absorb anything that stands in your way. Clean up the chaotic dungeon—if you can!

name: Dungeon Dreams Wanderers
summary: Travel, form bonds, explore a vast world filled with multiple-outcome quests, with your custom created protagonist in an adventure that blends old school JRPG, life simulation and role playing.

name: DuoBellum de Marionnette
summary: Even after their master's death, the dolls continue to engage in dueling dramas in secret. An old mansion deep in the forest. If the secret power hidden there is obtained, the curtain will rise on an even more fierce duel...

name: Duel Masters
summary: Based on the Duel Masters Trading Card game in Japan, Duel Masters was the first video game in the series. Developed by Amble and Produced by Takara, it was only released in Japan. It features cards from the first four sets of the TCG.

name: Dungeon Trail
summary: A role playing game where you gamble with human lives. Roll dice, change fate.

name: Dungeon of Erotic Master Reboot
summary: In a certain kingdom, there are three female warriors who are quite popular in their adventuring partyーhowever, they have their vices… Buried in debt and with their reputations on the line, will our heroines be able to take advantage of the chance of a lifetime and save the lost adventurer king?!

name: Dungeon Holdem
summary: Dungeon Holdem is the poker dungeon crawler deckbuilder. Forge your path as a warrior or wizard, unlocking powerful abilities to boost your hands. Master combos, stack hands, upgrade your deck, and slay monsters in this epic poker RPG.

name: Dumb Ways to Party
summary: The worlds dumbest party game is here! Play as your favorite Bean, and go head-to-head with up to three other players to become the Dumbest of the Dumb. Will you use skill, sabotage or sheer dumb luck to win?

name: Duckoleon
summary: Experience (mildly) accurate historical battles from the Napoleonic era, but from the perspective of DUCKS! Duckoleon is a multiplayer FPS with strategic elements. Exciting combat with units ranging from line infantry to cavalry and artillery, historical uniforms, cutie ducks and much more!

name: Dupery
summary: A terrible syndicate has infiltrated society, explore cases, listen to what the citizens have to say, and use that information to route out the good from the evil in this roguelike 'clock-like' deduction game. Can you uncover the head of the syndicate? Or will you be duped like the rest?

name: Dungeon Tourists
summary: Explore procedurally generated dungeons with up to 4 players. Take photos of the curiosities you come across. Throw stuff at them, unlock new floors, get rewards, and complete your collection!

name: Dual Fire Walled City
summary: Dual Fire Walled City is a story-driven co-op game for two players. Featuring close friends who grew up together in the Kowloon Walled City, only to be pulled onto vastly different life paths by a twist of fate. Get ready to immerse yourself in a classic Hong Kong-style movie.

name: Dune Buggy
summary: Dune Buggy is a 2D single player flash racing game. It has a total of 15 levels that the player must make their way through by driving the dune buggy from one end to the other, while avoiding hazards and overcoming obstacles such as high jumps.

name: DungeonSweeper
summary: A minesweeper rogue-like. Can you survive the dungeon?

name: Dungeoneer
summary: Dungeoneer is a rouge-like, RPG, souls-like maybe future MMO game. Taking big inspiration from Dark Souls, Runescape, Hypixels Skyblock, Metin 2 and Enter The Gungeon.

name: Duck Hunt
summary: A faithful tribute that captures every little detail of the original game developed by Nintendo in 1984. Test your reflexes in this PICO-8 demake of the NES classic!

name: Dungeon Concierge
summary:
Dungeon Concierge is a fast-paced Dungeon Crawler where you play as a wizard hired by a low budget company to maintain dungeons while the heroes are away.

Clean up the aftermath of epic battles in a chaotic medieval fantasy world, while trying to stay alive. Wield powerful spells to sweep through grime, dispose of hazards, and manipulate the environment to your advantage. Complete odd jobs, fulfill contracts, and make just enough gold to put bread on the table.

name: Dune Raider
summary: Surf the forgotten sands as a pirate of the dunes. Wreck ships with your trusty spear and use your loot to buy upgrades and explore dangerous biomes as you rise to fame in this open-world sand surfing roguelike.

name: Dumpling
summary: DUMPLing is a fast-paced top-down survival shooter with a metroidvania twist. Pulled into the strange land of DUMPL, you’ll explore tunnels in platformer perspective, fight dumpling-like enemies in top down perspective, and uncover a bizarre story about food, friendship, and survival.

name: Dungeon of Departure
summary: an independently developed, pixel art, visual novel set in an original universe which follows the silent, player protagonist and three companion characters as they struggle to find a way out of an increasingly puzzling, underground world.

name: Duck Battle Royale
summary: Step into the wacky world of Duck Battle Royale, where feathers fly and victory is quackers! Take on a hilarious cast of rivals as you fight your way to the top, one ridiculous showdown at a time. Every encounter is full of surprises, silly twists, and over-the-top moments that will keep you laughing.

name: Dual Force
summary: Save the world from the invaders — two heroes stand against the oncoming siege. Join the adventure and discover the world of this game!

name: DUD Detective Ulysses Day
summary: When trouble strikes, they hire DUD & when they hire DUD, things get nuts! Do you have what it takes to be in DUD's shoes? Sure, you do. So get down & dirty & play this point&click adventure game today. Sneak your your way in and out of trouble of recovering the stolen will.

name: Duck Block
summary: A new type of puzzle 2D platformer! Make the blocks materialize and guide the duck to the goal!

name: Dungeon Peplum
summary: Dungeon Peplum is a grim horror FPS where each step through the catacombs might be your last. Your single objective: survive and find your way out. Over eight types of weapons — from a trusty double-barreled shotgun to fast pistols and grenades — will help you cut through the darkness

name: Dumdum
summary: Speedrun your way through our fast-paced 2D/2.5D parkour made by two sleep-deprived devs. Jump, dash, solve puzzles, and maybe question our sanity. It’s colorful, it’s chaotic, and it’s just the beginning. Brace yourself for more madness ahead!

name: Dungeon
summary: Dungeon is a 90's style FPS where you play as John Grimm, a soldier trapped in a medieval dungeon filled with hidden rooms, zombies, and traps. Uncover secrets and Easter eggs while battling five powerful, element-themed bosses that hold the keys to your escape. Explore, fight, and choose your path!

name: Dungeon Battles
summary: Struggling to survive in the dungeon!

name: Duskfall
summary: Defend your village at dusk! Shoot the attacking crows, keep your population safe, and find all 5 keys before time runs out.

name: Dungeon Hero
summary: Find a way out of the dungeon. Collect treasures and earn points. Fight the dungeon guards. Potion vials restore health.

name: Dungeon of Doom
summary: Welcome to the depths of horror in Dungeon of Doom, a heart-pounding VR action RPG! Wield your weapon and unleash your magic as you battle the forces of darkness. Collect unique items, unlock skills and conquer boss fights in story mode - or survive endless waves in the arena.

name: Dungeon Story
summary: This is a card-based adventure game where you command three adventurers to explore dungeons, acquire skills and abilities, defeat monsters, collect rewards, and strengthen your party. Lead your trio to conquer the final boss!

name: Duel
summary: A fighting game without fighting mechanism.

name: Dungeons of Dusk
summary: Dungeons of DUSK is a classic turn based dungeon crawling RPG that takes place canonically between the episodes of the cult classic FPS. Are you... WORTHY?

name: Dungeonfall
summary: Dungeonfall is a roguelike game where players try to survive as long as possible to get the highest score.

name: Dunkirk: The Forgotten Soldier
summary: Survive the onslaught, rise from the ashes, and become the forgotten soldier history tried to erase.

name: Dungeon Divas
summary: Dungeon Divas is a block-pushing puzzle game where you solve levels to save a bunch of princesses. Add the rescued maidens to your roster and see their interactions as you proceed through the narrative.

name: Dungeonborne: Mithril Satchel
summary: Dungeonborne - Mithril Satchel is an extra supplement for Dungeonborne, which includes the following additional items: Unlocks 2 exclusive skins and supply pack with abundant adventuring supplies.

name: Dune: Awakening - Raiders of the Broken Lands
summary: Raiders of the Broken Lands DLC features a cosmetic pack inspired by the Smugglers of the Imperium. Customize your base with 74 building pieces and 17 decorations, and take the smuggler style into the desert with new armor, weapon, and vehicle variants, a cosmetic swatch, and emotes.

name: Duolty
summary: Duolty is a mystery, exploration and puzzle game developed by a single person. Dive into a strange world and befriend its curious inhabitants. Will you discover who you really are before it’s too late?

name: Dunk Cookies
summary: Break cookies. Dunk them in milk. Repeat. A satisfying incremental game where you crush cookies into a swirling vortex of milk. Upgrade your breaking power, unlock new stats via an expansive skill tree, and discover the ultimate satisfaction of the perfect dunk.

name: Dust to Dust
summary:
80000 hours

name: DuckTape Inc.
summary: Work for the notoriously stingy DuckTape Inc. Secure runaway anomalies as quickly and cheaply as possible in 1–5 player co-op. Stabilize systems, recover data, haul entities to the helicopter—and try not to become “too expensive.”

name: Dungeon Devotion
summary: Short idle clicker game about gathering a harem of woman ready to worship you. Change into many forms to please your worshippers while restoring your dungeon.

name: Dust Busters
summary: Dust Busters is an online cooperative cleaning game for up to 4 players. Prepare your mop to clean you out of bankruptcy, bring help to all types of strange clients, and dare yourself to clean the most extraordinary places!

name: Duck Duck Hotel
summary: A 3D cute management sim where you're a duck building and operating a treetop hotel for a variety of bird species. Strategically expand your tree, cater to each species' unique needs, and keep your feathery guests happy through all four seasons. Just don't ruffle any feathers, or it's game over!

name: Dungeon Antiqua 2
summary: Relive the golden age of dungeon RPGs with Dungeon Antiqua 2! A retro 2D dungeon crawler bursting with SNES nostalgia. Hack, slash, and survive relentless side-view encounters! With 10 jobs and endless skill combos, forge the ultimate party and conquer the depths—if you dare!

name: Dunjinn
summary: Turn-based dungeon crawl, every step advances foes; stealth, noise, and light matter. Procedural rooms mix traps, mimics, locks, loot; combat is gear-driven with augments, consumables, and breakable durability. Between runs use town to shop, craft/repair, vault gear; death drops your pack.

name: Dust and Sorcery
summary: Defend your village from El Enterrador's hordes of enemies using magic, guns and quick reflexes in this intense western action shooter.

name: Dustdrive: The Lightspeed Project
summary: A minimalist optimization game about reaching the speed of light. Build an experimental engine that runs off galactic dust to accelerate your ship to impossible speeds. Match dust signatures carefully and manage your energy to avoid Rapid Unscheduled Disassembly!

name: Duality Paradox
summary: Duality Paradox is a puzzle game where players control a character that switches between black and white. This color shift changes how the world is perceived: matching colors become walls, while opposite colors turn into passable floors.

name: Duck Shoot
summary: Duck Shoot is an arcade-simulation game where you play as Ashley, an aspiring photographer and a tourist on a mission to capture the perfect duck shot and win the golden duck award from the tropical sanctuary's photography competition. Guiding her is Momo, a cheeky, yet adorable monkey as her mentor.

name: Dust to Dust
summary: Fight for your afterlife in DUST TO DUST! As a ghost on the run in a specter research facility, dash through interconnected levels, befriend the psychic Matthias, and take control of his body and powers to break down hostile coalesced creatures and wipe them out once and for all.

name: DUD Bounce World
summary: A satisfying roguelike where a DUD logo bounces around the edge of the screen, activating special tiles to score larger and larger points. Create powerful builds and synergies to maximise your score and break the game in crazy ways.

name: Dungeon Mutt
summary: Traverse the dungeons of Clayman isle in this Goof Troop/Zelda/Donkey Kong inspired puzzle/platformer. Solve puzzles, clear dungeons, and upgrade your gear with loot so you can defeat the pirates that have overtaken the island, especially Captain Hippoeira, and rescue your lost son.

name: Dune Rancher
summary: Dune Rancher is a first-person incremental Moondust collecting game where you hoard materials and keep them safe from stealing Desert Spirits. Use Moondust to buy weapons, tools and robots to boost and automate your income.

name: Duckiost
summary: An exciting game in which you will find yourself in the role of a duck with a machine gun and will fight for your life.

name: Dungeon Misfits
summary: Dungeon Misfits is a chaotic action-roguelike where no two runs—and no two heroes—are ever the same.
